Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Intern
Quote: When someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Blue-Eyed Devil
Quote: I no longer believed in the idea of soul mates, or love at first sight. But I was beginning to believe that a very few times in your life, if you were lucky, you might meet someone who was exactly right for you. Not because he was perfect, or because you were, but because your combined flaws were arranged in a way that allowed two separate beings to hinge together.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Quote: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.

Author: C.G. Jung
Quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.

Author: Dave Matthews Band
Quote: A guy and a girl can be just friends, but at one point or another, they will fall for each other...Maybe temporarily, maybe at the wrong time, maybe too late, or maybe forever

Author: Haruki Murakami,  South of the Border, West of the Sun
Quote: I think you still love me, but we can’t escape the fact that I’m not enough for you. I knew this was going to happen. So I’m not blaming you for falling in love with another woman. I’m not angry, either. I should be, but I’m not. I just feel pain. A lot of pain. I thought I could imagine how much this would hurt, but I was wrong.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: You can talk with someone for years, everyday, and still, it won't mean as much as what you can have when you sit in front of someone, not saying a word, yet you feel that person with your heart, you feel like you have known the person for forever.... connections are made with the heart, not the tongue.

Author: Stephanie Perkins,  Anna and the French Kiss
Quote: For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.

Author: Candace Bushnell,  Sex and the City
Quote: Man may have discovered fire, but women discovered how to play with it.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Last Song
Quote: I mean, if the relationship can't survive the long term, why on earth would it be worth my time and energy for the short term?

Author: Gillian Anderson
Quote: Well, it seems to me that the best relationships - the ones that last - are frequently the ones that are rooted in friendship. You know, one day you look at the person and you see something more than you did the night before. Like a switch has been flicked somewhere. And the person who was just a friend is... suddenly the only person you can ever imagine yourself with.

Author: Donald Miller,  A Million Miles in a Thousand Years: What I Learned While Editing My Life
Quote: When you stop expecting people to be perfect, you can like them for who they are.

Author: Ray Bradbury,  Fahrenheit 451
Quote: Why is it,"he said, one time, at the subway entrance, "I feel I've known you so many years?""Because I like you,"she said, "and I don't want anything from you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me
Quote: I consider conversations with people to be mind exercises, but I don't want to pull a muscle, so I stretch a lot. That's why I'm constantly either rolling my eyes or yawning.

Author: Mae West
Quote: Every man I meet wants to protect me. I can't figure out what from.

Author: Shmuley Boteach
Quote: There is greatness in doing something you hate for the sake of someone you love.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: If conversation was the lyrics, laughter was the music, making time spent together a melody that could be replayed over and over without getting stale.

Author: Nick Hornby
Quote: It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party.

Author: Ernest Hemingway,  Men Without Women
Quote: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.

Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote: I know I am but summer to your heart, and not the full four seasons of the year.

Author: Taylor Swift
Quote: I suffer from girlnextdooritis where the guy is friends with you and that's it.

Author: Candace Bushnell,  Sex and the City
Quote: Maybe our girlfriends are our soulmates and guys are just people to have fun with.

Author: Julio Cortázar
Quote: Come sleep with me: We won't make Love,Love will make us.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: I want to be in a relationship where you telling me you love me is just a ceremonious validation of what you already show me.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage
Quote: To be fully seen by somebody, then, and be loved anyhow - this is a human offering that can border on miraculous.

Author: Stephanie Lennox,  I Don't Remember You
Quote: I’ve been fighting to be who I am all my life. What’s the point of being who I am, if I can’t have the person who was worth all the fighting for?

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: Holding Eleanor's hand was like holding a butterfly. Or a heartbeat. Like holding something complete, and completely alive.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  I Want Two apply for a job at our country's largest funeral home, and then wear a suit and noose to the job interview.
Quote: I want to grow a flower for every time someone tells me “F*** you.” Then I’ll go back to that person and pin the flower on their lapel in a gesture of friendship. And while they are looking down on it in astonishment, I’ll bunch up my knuckles and punch them in the face.

Author: Ken Kesey,  One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
Quote: Man, when you lose your laugh you lose your footing.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Safe Haven
Quote: Every couple needs to argue now and then. Just to prove that the relationship is strong enough to survive. Long-term relationships, the ones that matter, are all about weathering the peaks and the valleys.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: One of my main regrets in life is giving considerable thought to inconsiderate people.

Author: Jarod Kintz
Quote: I think the key indicator for wealth is not good grades, work ethic, or IQ. I believe it's relationships. Ask yourself two questions: How many people do I know, and how much ransom money could I get for each one?

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray
Quote: Never marry at all, Dorian. Men marry because they are tired, women, because they are curious: both are disappointed.

Author: Catherine Gilbert Murdock,  Dairy Queen
Quote: When you don't talk, there's a lot of stuff that ends up not getting said.

Author: Mary Manin Morrissey
Quote: Even though you may want to move forward in your life, you may have one foot on the brakes. In order to be free, we must learn how to let go. Release the hurt. Release the fear. Refuse to entertain your old pain. The energy it takes to hang onto the past is holding you back from a new life. What is it you would let go of today?

Author: Katja Millay,  The Sea of Tranquility
Quote: People like to say love is unconditional, but it's not, and even if it was unconditional, it's still never free. There's always an expectation attached. They always want something in return. Like they want you to be happy or whatever and that makes you automatically responsible for their happiness because they won't be happy unless you are ... I just don't want that responsibility.

Author: Martha Gellhorn,  Selected Letters
Quote: I know enough to know that no woman should ever marry a man who hated his mother.

Author: Patti Callahan Henry,  Between the Tides
Quote: Cheating and lying aren't struggles, they're reasons to break up.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: For there to be betrayal, there would have to have been trust first.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  At First Sight
Quote: Every couple has ups and downs, every couple argues, and that’s the thing—you’re a couple, and couples can’t function without trust.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  Along for the Ride
Quote: Relationships dont always make sense. Especially from the outside

Author: Brian Andreas
Quote: He loved her for almost everything she was & she decided that was enough to let him stay for a very long time.

Author: Susane Colasanti,  Waiting for You
Quote: If a girl starts out all casual with a guy and she doesn't tell him that she wants a relationship, it will never become a relationship. If you give the guy the impression that casual is okay with you, that's all he'll ever want. Be straight with him from the start. If he gets scared and runs away, he wasn't right for you.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Lots of things can be fixed. Things can be fixed. But many times, relationships between people cannot be fixed, because they should not be fixed. You're aboard a ship setting sail, and the other person has joined the inland circus, or is boarding a different ship, and you just can't be with each other anymore. Because you shouldn't be.

Author: Criss Jami,  Venus in Arms
Quote: To say that one waits a lifetime for his soulmate to come around is a paradox. People eventually get sick of waiting, take a chance on someone, and by the art of commitment become soulmates, which takes a lifetime to perfect.

Author: Mae West
Quote: A dame that knows the ropes isn't likely to get tied up.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can tell if two people are in love by how they hold each other’s hands, and how thick their sanitation gloves are.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Intern
Quote: Those sweet lips. My, oh my, I could kiss those lips all night long.Good things come to those who wait.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Who Moved My Choose?: An Amazing Way to Deal With Change by Deciding to Let Indecision Into Your Life
Quote: You know what I like most about people? Pets.

Author: David Richo
Quote: Our wounds are often the openings into the best and most beautiful part of us.

Author: Bill Maher
Quote: Women cannot complain about men anymore until they start getting better taste in them.

Author: Sara Evans
Quote: I know my heart will never be the sameBut I'm telling myself I'll be okay

Author: Stephanie Klein,  Straight Up and Dirty
Quote: What we wait around a lifetime for with one person, we can find in a moment with someone else.

Author: Albert Camus,  The Fall
Quote: I used to advertise my loyalty and I don't believe there is a single person I loved that I didn't eventually betray.

Author: Marc Wambolt,  Poems from the Heart
Quote: I may not always be with you But when we're far apartRemember you will be with meRight inside my heart

Author: Aimee Carter,  The Goddess Test
Quote: I care,"he said in a trembling voice. "I care so much that I do not know how to tell you without it seeming inconsequential compared to how I feel. Even if I am distant at times and seem as if I do not want to be with you, it is only because this scares me, too.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I told her I'd wait forever for her, but that was before I found somebody else who'd give me a ride home.

Author: Amy Sedaris,  I Like You: Hospitality Under the Influence
Quote: Don't leave a piece of jewelry at his house so you can go back and get it later; he may be with his real girlfriend.

Author: T.S. Eliot,  The Cocktail Party
Quote: We die to each other daily. What we know of other people is only our memory of the moments during which we knew them. And they have changed since then. To pretend that they and we are the same is a useful and convenient social convention which must sometimes be broken. We must also remember that at every meeting we are meeting a stranger.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Sputnik Sweetheart
Quote: Of course it hurt that we could never love each other in a physical way. We would have been far more happy if we had. But that was like the tides, the change of seasons--something immutable, an immovable destiny we could never alter. No matter how cleverly we might shelter it, our delicate friendship wasn't going to last forever. We were bound to reach a dead end. That was painfully clear.

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez
Quote: nothing in this world was more difficult than love.

Author: Simone Elkeles,  Rules of Attraction
Quote: We kiss all the time."I clear my throat, then add, "We just...do it in private.""A smug expression crosses his face. "I don't buy it for a second, 'cause if you were my girlfriend and a stud like me was livin' in your house, I'd kiss you in front of the guy every chance I got as a reminder.""A reminder of w-w-what?""That you were mine.

Author: Brian L. Weiss,  Messages from the Masters: Tapping Into the Power of Love
Quote: Forgive the past. It is over. Learn from it and let go. People are constantly changing and growing. Do not cling to a limited, disconnected, negative image of a person in the past. See that person now. Your relationship is always alive and changing.

Author: L. Frank Baum,  The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
Quote: I think you are wrong to want a heart. It makes most people unhappy. If you only knew it, you are in luck not to have a heart.

Author: Henry Winkler
Quote: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  Along for the Ride
Quote: You couldn't just pick and choose at will when someone depended on you, or loved you. It wasn't like a light switch, easy to turn on or off. If you were in, you were in. Out, you were out.

Author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer
Quote: Moving on is easy. It's staying moved on that's trickier.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: How would your life be different if…You walked away from gossip and verbal defamation? Let today be the day…You speak only the good you know of other people and encourage others to do the same.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Never rearrange your life in order to meet Mr. Darcy half way. If he couldn’t see your worth at the moment you met then he won’t two years later. May the halls of Pemberly be filled with his regrets and your life filled with thankfulness because of this revelation.

Author: Cornel West,  Breaking Bread: Insurgent Black Intellectual Life
Quote: We have to recognise that there cannot be relationships unless there is commitment, unless there is loyalty, unless there is love, patience, persistence.

Author: Jane Austen,  Emma
Quote: Seldom, very seldom, does complete truth belong to any human disclosure; seldom can it happen that something is not a little disguised or a little mistaken.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me
Quote: I like my relationships like I like my eggs. Over easy.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me
Quote: I used to date the lead singer of The Cranberries, but she cheated on me. Turns out she had some turkey on the side.

Author: Patrick Rothfuss,  The Wise Man's Fear
Quote: Books are a poor substitute for female companionship, but they are easier to find.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage
Quote: You can measure the happiness of a marriage by the number of scars that each partner carries on their tongues, earned from years of biting back angry words.

Author: Lorrie Moore,  Like Life
Quote: This is what happened in love. One of you cried a lot and then both of you grew sarcastic.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: There are no coincidences in life. What person that wandered in and out of your life was there for some purpose, even if they caused you harm. Sometimes, it doesn’t make sense the short periods of time we get with people, or the outcomes from their choices. However, if you turn it over to God he promises that you will see the big picture in the hereafter. Nothing is too small to be a mistake.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  $3.33
Quote: Patience and wisdom walk hand in hand, like two one-armed lovers.

Author: Jess C. Scott
Quote: A fit, healthy body—that is the best fashion statement

Author: bell hooks,  All About Love: New Visions
Quote: When we face pain in relationships our first response is often to sever bonds rather than to maintain commitment.

Author: Rainer Maria Rilke,  Letters to a Young Poet
Quote: only someone who is ready for everything, who doesn't exclude any experience, even the most incomprehensible, will live the relationship with another person as something alive and will himself sound the depths of his own being.

Author: Charlaine Harris,  Dead to the World
Quote: It's probably a bad indicator of your lifestyle when you miss your ex-boyfriend because he's absolutely lethal.

Author: pleasefindthis,  I Wrote This For You
Quote: You’re just another story I can’t tell anymore.

Author: Sue Monk Kidd,  The Secret Life of Bees
Quote: If you need something from somebody always give that person a way to hand it to you.

Author: Henny Youngman
Quote: Do you know what it means to come home at night to a woman who'll give you a little love, a little affection, a little tenderness? It means you're in the wrong house, that's what it means.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  Wicked Lovely
Quote: I felt like an animal, and animals don’t know sin, do they?

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: If you spend your time hoping someone will suffer the consequences for what they did to your heart, then you're allowing them to hurt you a second time in your mind.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I've often wondered what makes a relationship last. I guess the best answer is it's the one right after the next to the last one.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake & help us see we are worth so much more than we're settling for.

Author: Daphne Gottlieb,  Why Things Burn
Quote: you can take this mouththis wound you wantbut you can't kissand make itbetter.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: When you hold a grudge, you want someone else’s sorrow to reflect your level of hurt but the two rarely meet.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Valkyries
Quote: He knew one of the women well, and had shared his universe with her. They had seen the same mountains, and the same trees, although each of them had seem them differently. She knew his weaknesses, his moments of hatred, of despair. Yet she was there at his side. They shared the same universe.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My girlfriend bought me a collared shirt for my birthday, mainly so I don’t get too far ahead of her when she takes me for a walk.

Author: Scott Dikkers,  You Are Worthless: Depressing Nuggets of Wisdom Sure to Ruin Your Day
Quote: Statistically speaking, there is a 65 percent chance that the love of your life is having an affair. Be very suspicious.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Survivor
Quote: Six hundred and forty fish later, the only thing I know is everything you love will die. The first time you meet someone special, you can count on them one day being dead and in the ground.

Author: Marian Keyes,  Watermelon
Quote: Failed relationships can be described as so much wasted make-up.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  EyeLeash: A Blog Novel
Quote: V-Day…if you need this one day in a year to show everyone else you truly care for “your loved one” I think it’s quite stupid. I hate this commercialism. It’s all artificial, and has nothing to do with real love.

Author: Jenny Han,  It's Not Summer Without You
Quote: That's when I finally got it. I finally understood. It wasn't the thought that counted. It was the actual execution that mattered, the showing up for somebody. The intent behind it wasn't enough. Not for me. Not anymore. It wasn't enough to know that deep down, he loved me. You had to actually say it to somebody, show them you cared. And he just didn't. Not enough.

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: And then the line was quite but not dead. I almost felt like he was there in my room with me, but in a way it was better, like I was not in my room and he was not in his, but instead we were together in some invisible and tenuous third space that could only be visited on the phone.

Author: Fulton J. Sheen,  Seven Words of Jesus and Mary: Lessons from Cana and Calvary
Quote: It takes three to make love, not two: you, your spouse, and God. Without God people only succeed in bringing out the worst in one another. Lovers who have nothing else to do but love each other soon find there is nothing else. Without a central loyalty life is unfinished.

Author: Gayle Forman,  Where She Went
Quote: There are so many things that demand to be said. Where did you go? Do you ever think about me? You've ruined me. Are you okay? But of course, I can't say any of that.

Author: David Levithan,  The Lover's Dictionary
Quote: misgivings, n.Last night, I got up the courage to ask you if you regretted us. "There are things I miss,"you said. "But if I didn't have you, I'd miss more.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Safe Haven
Quote: Love doesn't mean anything if you're not willing to make a commitment, and you have to think not only about what you want, but about what he wants. Not just now, but in the future.

Author: Helen Fielding,  Bridget Jones's Diary
Quote: Can officially confirm that the way to a man's heart these days is not through beauty, food, sex, or alluringness of character, but merely the ability to seem not very interested in him.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  A Wild Sheep Chase
Quote: Most everything you think you know about me is nothing more than memories.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you were to ask me the best time of day to fall in love, I'd say, "Now."But you'd also have to remember to factor in the fact that my watch is eleven minutes fast.

Author: Brandon Sanderson,  Warbreaker
Quote: Mocking a woman is like drinking too much wine. It may be fun for a short time, but the hangover is hell.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: A busy, vibrant, goal-oriented woman is so much more attractive than a woman who waits around for a man to validate her existence.

Author: Hanh Nhat Thich,  Teachings on Love
Quote: Through my love for you, I want to express my love for the whole cosmos, the whole of humanity, and all beings. By living with you, I want to learn to love everyone and all species. If I succeed in loving you, I will be able to love everyone and all species on Earth... This is the real message of love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Titanic would never have sunk if it were made out of a sink.
Quote: The only gift I have to give, is the ability to receive. If giving is a gift, and it surely is, then my gift to you is to allow you to give to me.

Author: Katie Kacvinsky,  Awaken
Quote: Don't worry about hurting me, if that's what you're afraid of. I want to get hurt. At least I´ll feel something for a change.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Who Moved My Choose?: An Amazing Way to Deal With Change by Deciding to Let Indecision Into Your Life
Quote: I’m willing to die for the woman I love. I just want to take 75 years to do it.

Author: Pandora Poikilos,  Excuse Me, My Brains Have Stepped Out
Quote: The best relationships in our lives are the best not because they have been the happiest ones, they are that way because they have stayed strong through the most tormentful of storms.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Don’t try to hog loneliness and keep it all to yourself. Share it with a special someone.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
Quote: I have no right to say or do anything that diminishes a man in his own eyes. What matters is not what I think of him but what he thinks of himself. Hurting a man in his dignity is a crime.

Author: Joshua Harris,  I Kissed Dating Goodbye: A New Attitude Toward Relationships and Romance
Quote: When God knows you're ready for the responsibility of commitment, He'll reveal the right person under the right circumstances.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Sometimes the best and worst times of your life can coincide. It is a talent of the soul to discover the joy in pain—-thinking of moments you long for, and knowing you’ll never have them again. The beautiful ghosts of our past haunt us, and yet we still can’t decide if the pain they caused us out weighs the tender moments when they touched our soul. This is the irony of love.

Author: Kate Hudson
Quote: You Can't Lose Something You Never Had

Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote: When you struggle with your partner, you are struggling with yourself. Every fault you see in them touches a denied weakness in yourself.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Sing You Home
Quote: You know someone's right for you when the things they don't have to say are even more important than the things they do.

Author: Christina Westover
Quote: Unrequited love is the infinite curse of a lonely heart.

Author: Meghan O'Rourke
Quote: Relationships take up energy; letting go of them, psychiatrists theorize, entails mental work. When you lose someone you were close to, you have to reassess your picture of the world and your place in it. The more your identity was wrapped up with the deceased, the more difficult the loss.

Author: Tim McGraw
Quote: We all take different paths in life, but no matter where we go, we take a little of each other everyhwere.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Stairs, are they going up or are they going down? They’re so confusing! If love were a physical thing, it would be stairs.

Author: Dorothy Parker,  The Portable Dorothy Parker
Quote: I won't telephone him. I'll never telephone him again as long as I live. He'll rot in hell, before I'll call him up. You don't have to give me strength, God; I have it myself. If he wanted me, he could get me. He knows where I am. He knows I'm waiting here. He's so sure of me, so sure. I wonder why they hate you, as soon as they are sure of you.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't being said. The art of reading between the lines is a life long quest of the wise.

Author: Julie de Lespinasse
Quote: You know that when I hate you, it is because I love you to a point of passion that unhinges my soul.

Author: Wm. Paul Young
Quote: Trust is the fruit of a relationship in which you know you are loved.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..
Quote: I would pour you a glass of wine, but wouldn’t it be more romantic if you sipped it out of my armpit?

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: I just...I just miss him. And I hate being so alone.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I don’t want to make love last, I want to make love second to last. The last thing we’ll do is cuddle.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  99 Cents For Some Nonsense
Quote: Between hello and goodbye is I love you.

Author: Dale Renton
Quote: When what you hear and what you see don't match, trust your eyes.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  I Want
Quote: I want to create a seventeen-syllable word that encompasses the human condition, and then use that word to form the world’s most perfect haiku.

Author: John Joseph Powell,  The Secret of Staying in Love
Quote: It is an absolute human certainty that no one can know his own beauty or perceive a sense of his own worth until it has been reflected back to him in the mirror of another loving, caring human being.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  Tongue-Tied
Quote: Last night I was seriously considering whether I was a bisexual or not but I don’t think so though I’m not sure if I’d like to be and argh I don’t think there’s anything wrong with that, if you like a person, you like the person, not their genitals.

Author: Dale Carnegie,  How to Win Friends and Influence People
Quote: When dealing with people, remember you are not dealing with creatures of logic, but with creatures bristling with prejudice and motivated by pride and vanity.

Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote: You fit into melike a hook into an eyea fish hookan open eye

Author: Brian Andreas
Quote: Wanting him to come back before anyone notices part of the world has not moved since he left.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: If you have the woman you love, what more do you need? Well, besides an alibi for the time of her husband’s murder.

Author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack
Quote: I suppose that since most of our hurts come through relationships so will our healing, and I know that grace rarely makes sense for those looking in from the outside.

Author: Tiffany Madison
Quote: Most men claim to desire driven, independent and confident women. Yet when confronted with such a creature reverence often evolves into resent. For just like women, men need to be needed.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  EyeLeash: A Blog Novel
Quote: My head’ll explode if I continue with this escapism.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: A true gentleman is one that apologizes anyways, even though he has not offended a lady intentionally. He is in a class all of his own because he knows the value of a woman's heart.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I make love like the 13th floor is the 14th floor of a hotel. I give it that little extra that takes it to a whole new level.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: Hope for love, pray for love, wish for love, dream for love…but don’t put your life on hold waiting for love.

Author: Zsa Zsa Gabor
Quote: I never hated a man enough to give him his diamonds back.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  A Wild Sheep Chase
Quote: Sometimes I get real lonely sleeping with you.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: Oh, you know. Jace reminds me of an old boyfriend. Some guys look at you like they want sex. Jace looks at you like you've already had sex, it was great, and now you're just friends--even though you want more. Drives girls crazy. You know what I mean?"Yes, Clary thought. "No,"she said.pg. 280

Author: Brené Brown
Quote: I define connection as the energy that exists between people when they feel seen, heard, and valued; when they can give and receive without judgment; and when they derive sustenance and strength from the relationship.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I’ve got a way with love. Away with love.

Author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack
Quote: Submission is not about authority and it is not obedience; it is all about relationships of love and respect.

Author: Stephen R. Covey
Quote: Trust is the glue of life. It's the most essential ingredient in effective communication. It's the foundational principle that holds all relationships.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.
Quote: More people are leaving TV behind to read my books than ever before. In the last year alone I gained over two readers (three, to be exact). So I’d like to take a moment and say thanks mom, dad, and kidnap victim I keep chained in the basement.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray
Quote: You like every one; that is to say, you are indifferent to every one.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love flows like flowers, and grows like water. I’m so thirsty for romance I could drink a dozen roses.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: My girlfriend is sad and quiet and keeps me up all night worrying about her.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Every woman that finally figured out her worth, has picked up her suitcases of pride and boarded a flight to freedom, which landed in the valley of change.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: 0 plus 100 equals 100. But so does 50 plus 50, only with more balance. Let this be a lesson in love.

Author: Lev Grossman,  The Magicians
Quote: I got my heart's desire, and there my troubles began.

Author: David Sedaris,  Dress Your Family in Corduroy and Denim
Quote: Hugh and I have been together for so long that in order to arouse extraordinary passion, we need to engage in physical combat. Once, he hit me on the back of the head with a broken wineglass, and I fell to the floor pretending to be unconscious. That was romantic, or would have been had he rushed to my side rather than stepping over my body to fetch the dustpan.

Author: Amy Poehler
Quote: I want to be around people that do things. I don’t want to be around people anymore that judge or talk about what people do. I want to be around people that dream and support and do things.

Author: Chelsea Fine,  Sophie & Carter
Quote: Love.Not the kind you see in the movies or hear about on the radio.The real kind.The kind that gets beaten down and bloody, yet perseveres.The kind that hopes even when hope seems foolish.The kind that can forgives. The kind that believes in healing. The kind that can sit in silence and feel renewed.The real kind of love.It's rare and we have it..

Author: Andrea Gibson
Quote: That night when you kissed me, I left a poem in your mouth, and you can hear some of the lines every time you breathe out.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Two become one when two are in love—or when the waitress asks about our dinner bill. I’ll pay next time, I promise.

Author: Scott Adams,  God's Debris: A Thought Experiment
Quote: The best you can hope for in a relationship is to findsomeone whose flaws are the sort you don’t mind. It isfutile to look for someone who has no flaws, or someonewho is capable of significant change; that sort of personexists only in our imaginations.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: To find out if she really loved me, I hooked her up to a lie detector. And just as I suspected, my machine was broken.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My brain is divided into two butterflies, and both are in love with your rose-shaped heart. If you've got the garden, I've got my whole life.

Author: Kate Chisman,  Run
Quote: We ruined each other by being together. We destroyed each other’s dreams.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If it’s the last kiss, we’d better make it last. I hope you don’t have anywhere to be, because I have the rest of my life free.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Unreturned love is like trying to make a sandwich with one slice of bread. Don’t stress—fold it in half and love yourself.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: She has a sly smile, and eyes that seem to see my essence as they explore my soul and implore my spirit to enter her. I look at her and I see love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ll be your Dostoevsky, if you’ll be my Tolstoy. Our life together will be so full of despair that death will be like a gulag full of joy.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I’m running from the very person I’m chasing, and this is how I know I’m in love.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: We know from daily life that we exist for other people first of all, for whose smiles and well-being our own happiness depends.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Red Pyramid
Quote: Have you ever noticed how parents can go from the most wonderful people in the world to totally embarrassing in three seconds?

Author: Margaret Atwood,  Lady Oracle
Quote: How could I be sleeping with this particular man.... Surely only true love could justify my lack of taste.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Life, it’s made up of two things—time and love. A watch tells one, but what tells the other? We tell each other.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: One of the best times for figuring out who you are & what you really want out of life? Right after a break-up.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: Making love to me is amazing. Wait, I meant: making love, to me, is amazing. The absence of two little commas nearly transformed me into a sex god.

Author: Leona Lewis
Quote: Thought I couldn't live without youIt's gonna hurt when it heals tooEven though I really love youI'm gonna smile cause I deserve toQuickly I'm learning to love againAll I know is I'mma be ok

Author: Aberjhani,  Elemental: The Power of Illuminated Love
Quote: The words ‘I Love You’ kill, and resurrect millions, in less than a second.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Our love went from fly to flower to butterfly, and it was meant to beautifully flutter, not sit still on a shelf like a trophy to be collected.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: ...the opposite of love is not hate -- it's apathy. It's not giving a damn. If somebody hates me, they must "feel"something ... or they couldn't possibly hate. Therefore, there's some way in which I can get to them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: We made eyes at each other, and then we made love. We also made other things too, like meatloaf.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: When we make love, I orgasm much sooner than her. That’s because I know a shortcut on my bicycle.

Author: Byron Katie
Quote: It's not your job to like me - it's mine

Author: Greg Behrendt,  He's Just Not That Into You: The No-Excuses Truth to Understanding Guys
Quote: I believe in love the verb, not the noun.

Author: Mary Manin Morrissey
Quote: Even though you may want to move forward in your life, you may have one foot on the brakes. In order to be free, we must learn how to let go. Release the hurt. Release the fear. Refuse to entertain your old pain. The energy it takes to hang onto the past is holding you back from a new life. What is it you would let go of today?

Author: Gustave Flaubert,  Sentimental Education
Quote: It’s hard to communicate anything exactly and that’s why perfect relationships between people are difficult to find.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: It’s me and you, or me and knitting. Don’t make me choose. Ugh, #love.

Author: W.H. Auden
Quote: If equal affection cannot be,Let the more loving one be me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: People tell me I look like my father. I've never seen my dad, so does that mean I look invisible?

Author: Greg Behrendt,  He's Just Not That Into You: The No-Excuses Truth to Understanding Guys
Quote: He doesn’t have to love your CD collection. He doesn’t have to love your shoes. But any good, mature guy better make an attempt to love your friends and family—especially when they’re great.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The difference between you and everyone else, is everyone else. And that’s a lot, so you should feel special.

Author: Dora J. Arod,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: My love is pizza shaped. Won’t you have a slice? It’s circular, so there’s enough to go around.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You
Quote: My love is expansive. Your love is expensive.

Author: Tarjei Vesaas,  The Bridges
Quote: What you want most you push away from you.You want more than you care to admit.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m hard to love, but I love hard, like my heart is the sun yearning to tan your naked body. I promise I won’t burn you.

Author: John Grogan,  Marley and Me: Life and Love With the World's Worst Dog
Quote: It's just the most amazing thing to love a dog, isn't it? It makes our relationships with people seem as boring as a bowl of oatmeal.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  EyeLeash: A Blog Novel
Quote: Maybe you could be mine / or maybe we’ll be entwined / aimless in this sexless foreplay.

Author: Adam S. McHugh
Quote: Because introverts are typically good listeners and, at least, have the appearance of calmness, we are attractive to emotionally needy people. Introverts, gratified that other people are initiating with them, can easily get caught in these exhausting and unsatisfying relationships.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I realize all guys have thorns. But I am a rose, and she chose a cactus over me. I wish her luck with her dry, desert-like existence with him.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love now, not later. Also, love later.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray
Quote: The reason we all like to think so well of others is that we are all afraid for ourselves. The basis of optimism is sheer terror.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My hands will get dirty holding your rose-shaped heart, because love is like gardening—it’s earthy and takes work to keep it alive.

Author: Bonnie Eaker Weil,  Financial Infidelity: Seven Steps to Conquering the #1 Relationship Wrecker
Quote: Over time, any deception destroys intimacy, and without intimacy couples cannot have true and lasting love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I had a second friend come over to my house, and do you know what I called her? A refill. If relationships aren’t drinkable, why do we thirst for them so much?

Author: David Foster Wallace,  A Supposedly Fun Thing I'll Never Do Again: Essays and Arguments
Quote: Lonely people tend, rather, to be lonely because they decline to bear the psychic costs of being around other humans. They are allergic to people. People affect them too strongly.

Author: Milan Kundera,  The Unbearable Lightness of Being
Quote: Physical love is unthinkable without violence.

Author: Greg Behrendt,  He's Just Not That Into You: The No-Excuses Truth to Understanding Guys
Quote: The quickest way to rectify that mistake (choosing the wrong person) is by learning from that, moving on, and choosing much more wisely in the future.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: There comes a time in your life when you have to choose to turn the page, write another book or simply close it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I drank her essence, and it’s like she never existed and now I’m thirsty again. Let this be a lesson in love.

Author: Flavia Weedn
Quote: Some people come into our lives and leave footprints on our hearts and we are never ever the same.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Let’s be romantic and dance in the rain. I’ll prove my feelings for you by bringing an umbrella, because I’m drowning in my love for you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I don’t want my love with her to wither like grapes on a vine, so I’ll water it with romance to turn it into wine.

Author: Toni Bentley
Quote: If a man can possess a woman sexually -really possess- he won't need to control her ideas, her opinions, her clothes, her friends, even her other lovers.

Author: Toni Morrison,  Song of Solomon
Quote: She was the third beer. Not the first one, which the throat receives with almost tearful gratitude; nor the second, that confirms and extends the pleasure of the first. But the third, the one you drink because it's there, because it can't hurt, and because what difference does it make?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ll wear a maze on a necklace, dangling over my chest, because if you want to get at my heart, you have to be ready to lose yourself.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I used to think how lucky she was to have me, but now I realize that’s backwards. A spirit of gratitude yields patience, love, and forgiveness.

Author: Gillian Flynn,  Gone Girl
Quote: Because isn’t that the point of every relationship: to be known by someone else, to be understood? He gets me. She gets me. Isn’t that the simple magic phrase?

Author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska
Quote: Why don’t we break up? I guess I stay with her because she stays with me. And that’s not an easy thing to do.

Author: Pandora Poikilos,  Excuse Me, My Brains Have Stepped Out
Quote: Learn to deal with the fact that you are not a perfect person but you are a person that deserves respect and honesty.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Most scars are invisible. Damn transparent knives. Does anything cut deeper than love? I need to get some new body armor.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When she’s cuddled close, I feel there’s nothing I can’t do, and I can’t do nothing about it, because my heart is her heart for as long as she wants it.

Author: Niall Horan
Quote: Being single doesn't mean you're weak, it means that you're strong enough to wait for the right person.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: I make love with a focus and intensity that most people reserve for sleep.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My I love you was a measured response, like one gallon of coffee in one cup of sugar. It was just overflowing with an awakening of my soul.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: We fell in love like two medium pizzas in one large stomach. I wish dad would have saved a few slices for us.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The curve of her smile, the curve of the small of her back, the curve of her laugh, everything about her makes me want to be more well-rounded.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: As a fiction writer, let me make it up, and let me make it up to you. I’ll pen our love story, if you’ll be my co-author.

Author: Gilles Deleuze
Quote: If you're trapped in the dream of the Other, you're fucked.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: People don’t buy products—they buy people. It’s called slavery. I mean networking. It’s called networking.

Author: James Salter
Quote: They lay silently. She was staring at something across the room. She was making him feel uncomfortable. 'It wouldn't work. It's the attraction of opposites,' he said.We're not opposites.'I don't mean just you and me. Women fall in love when they get to know you. Men are just the opposite. When they finally know you they're ready to leave.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Why are desire scales 1-10? They should be 1-12, like a clock, because I want her 1-12, I mean like all the time.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Nothing carries meaning. People carry meaning. We are the porters of importance.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Dinner was a riot, but the food was bland, so I doused it with pepper spray. The chef wanted to protest, but he didn’t, because I had the pepper spray.

Author: Bridget Davis
Quote: I hope we'll be friends forever, together we'll always be. I don't think you understand just how much you mean to me. And one day when we part our ways, we'll think back to the past and think about how happy we are 'cause our friendship will always last.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The sides of buildings should be like the tops of lakes. I’d fish through your window hoping to catch a smile.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I don't understand dating.. and the other things that people do.. all I know is that you ought to find the one you recognize. The one who gives you four arms, four legs, four eyes, and has the other half of your heart. There's only one of those, so what are all the other things for? Like dating?

Author: Doug Fetherling
Quote: Your absence has not taught me to be alone, it merely has shown that when together we cast a single shadow on the wall.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Snow is not microwave friendly. In fact, snow is not too friendly at all, unless you first buy it a few beers. Then it’s just downright slutty.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She said, “I’m having the stairs rebuilt,” and I replied, “No need to get sexual with me.” I’m a bring my own elevator kind of lover anyway.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A Dragon Rose is a flying flower that breathes fire. A relationship isn’t truly a romance if there isn’t a tiny element of danger involved.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I make furniture that can be used as weapons. The most dangerous piece of furniture is the Loveseat.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She asked me how I slept. Knowing she meant quality of sleep, I said I slept naked. It’s true. Ask any of the joggers who saw me sleepwalking.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I know half, and I know two guys who each know half of half, so together we’re altogether. Let this be a lesson in networking.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I said I made a special trip to get her favorite item, because it sounded more romantic than admitting I randomly had it already. Now that’s love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The storm is coming whether you’re aware of it or not, and whether you’re prepared for it or not. Thank God you have a man like me in your life, a man with a variety of umbrellas for sale in an affordable range of prices.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love letting her know how much she means to me. A love in secret is but a shadow that’s cold and lonely.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: He said he came in second place, so I assumed there were only two competitors. But you never know with love, there may have been a third party involved.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: The waves were choppy, like Chuck Norris' karate hands. The ocean would have been still, if I weren't making love in it.

Author: E.E. Cummings
Quote: And now you are and I am and we're a mystery which will never happen again.

Author: Margaret George,  Memoirs of Cleopatra
Quote: So I learned two things that night, and the next day, from him: the perfection of a moment, and the fleeting nature of it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: To become one who believes two become one, you need love in your life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She said she loved me, and I didn’t believe it for a minute. Maybe 59 seconds, but not a whole minute. I may be gullible, but I’m not without an accurate way to measure time.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She doesn’t want me to leave, and she doesn’t want me to stay. That’s a double helping of Doesn’t Want Me, and one big I’m Not Hungry back at her.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: For our first date we went Dutch. We would have gone another nationality, but they are the tallest.

Author: Audrey Niffenegger,  The Time Traveler's Wife
Quote: Right now we are here, and nothing can mar our perfection, or steal the joy of this perfect moment.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  My love can only occupy one person at a time
Quote: My ashtray is full, the carton of cigarettes is empty, and I just cremated grandpa. But I never inhaled—or told him I loved him.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When I win, it’s because I’m skilled. When I lose, it’s because my opponent is lucky. But when I fall in love, it’s because I’m lucky and she’s skilled.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Making benches is no walk in the park. It takes one a lot of love to make a bench, and then it takes two to make love on that bench.

Author: Edith Hamilton,  Mythology: Timeless Tales of Gods and Heroes
Quote: Love cannot live where there is no trust.

Author: Jim Butcher,  Small Favor
Quote: Caring about someone isn't complicated. It isn't easy. But it isn't complicated, either. Kinda like lifting the engine block out of a car.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My hobbies include rubbing my nipples across a cheese grater, meeting cat ladies on Tinder, and voting for either Democrat or Republican every four years. You could say I am a torture enthusiast.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her and I, we passed each other, and now she’s in my past. That’s one present I’d like to unwrap in the future.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: The battle you are going through is not fueled by the words or actions of others; it is fueled by the mind that gives it importance.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You don’t need to have a fight before great sex. I can keep my cool and still bring the heat every time.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Instead of a vow of silence, I took a vow of invisibility. At that time you were looking for someone to love, and that’s why you couldn’t see me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Based on the questions we both answered, we’re a 0% love match. That means we’re 100% compatible, once I enlighten her to the correct perspective on life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Our love will blend together like turquoise is blue and green. There’s no depression or envy when both blur into one.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I called his broken promise heartbreaking, and he called it growing up. Oh, that’s mature—blame it on maturity.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I remember her words about remembering my words, and that’s when it hit me: the quickest way to scalpel open a heart is with a declaration of love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love firm hugs. Statues are so affectionate. Well, at least compared to my ex wife.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: I realized I’m in love. It's always been right in front of me.

Author: Sam Levenson
Quote: Siblings: children of the same parents, each of whom is perfectly normal until they get together.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me
Quote: With all the money my uncle embezzled over the years, it's no surprise he lives in a gated community. But what is amazing, however, is that he somehow managed to get his own cell.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: When forever becomes a place...when forever ceases to be just a word… when it ceases to be just a measurement of time…but instead becomes a place where soul mates can dance to the song in their hearts... that is a reflection of true love.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: If a man, who says he loves you, won’t tell you the details of a private conversation between him and another woman you can be sure he is not protecting your heart. He is protecting himself and the women he has feelings for. Wise women simply see things as they are, not as their low self-esteem allows.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ll stand by you forever. Or at least until noon, and then I’ll go stand under the cabana. Isn’t love amazing?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I water fake plants, because I’m growing a garden of fake mustaches. Lest no man (or woman) question my ability as a lover.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have a tongue like a rose petal, and when I say I love you, it has the fragrance of truth. My words are my garden, and I’m planting our future.

Author: Marilyn Monroe
Quote: Husbands are chiefly good as lovers when they are betraying their wives.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Everything I’ve learned about handshakes is from hands-on experience. Due to hygiene, I only network with rubber glove manufacturers.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m half chameleon, half camouflage, and wholly in love with you, though you’d never be able to see it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ll stand by you. And by stand I mean cower in your shadow. It’s probably cold there, so I’m going to knit myself a warm cat sweater to wear.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I don’t like breakfast, because I like things fixed and slow. Let’s just take our relationship morning by morning.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My heartbeat is a pulse, and it pumps out sonic vibrations that resonate with her mind as she lays her head on my chest. Listen silently and you can hear the frequency of love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She looked, but she couldn’t see. She was wearing an emotional blindfold, and though she heard me say I love you, she just didn’t listen.

Author: Milan Kundera,  Laughable Loves
Quote: Yes, it's a well-known fact about you: you're like death, you take everything.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My eyes are bronze, my hair is turning silver, and my heart is gold. Oh, and my love for you belongs in the Olympics, because it’s Special.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’d fight for your love like I’m Tyler Durden. I want you to hit on me as hard as you can.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: For the funeral I needed a plus one, so I rented a hooker. And then I rented a movie. Rest in peace Grandpa, or whoever you were.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ve changed, and she’s changed, but we haven’t changed together. We were in separate dressing rooms the whole time we dated.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I buried the lasagna, because it was better than disposing of a dead body. I’ve been burned in a relationship, but never in an oven. I’ll try harder.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: There's someone for everyone. And when my clones get here, everyone will be able to have that someone. Prices start at $99.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can’t use my intellect to figure out how to bypass my intellect. Love lies through the spirit, not the mind, and love never lies.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My ex-girlfriend was exquisite, while my current girlfriend is merely quisite. The ex always makes the past seem more excellent than the present.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She brews a bruise on my heart, and drinks it like a beer. She calls it love, but she would, because she’s drunk on my torment.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I dance so fluid you’d think I’m a fish. I don’t need to drink to be able to dance—I am the drink. Have a sip and find out for yourself.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I don’t like my circle of friends, so I’m changing them to a square. Love shapes our lives, so why not shape who we love?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  $3.33
Quote: I’m very close to my dad. He’s about six inches away right now and snoring in my ears.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Anything disguised as anything is chameleon. A ghost disguised as an unobservable and invisible object is a great example. Still, that’s easier to see than the love my ex wife had for me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’d rather sell one thing for one million dollars, than sell one million things for one dollar each. I feel the same about my love and women.

Author: Ashly Lorenzana
Quote: The end of a relationship is not always a failure. Sometimes all the love in the world is not enough to save something. In these cases, it is not a matter of fault from either person. Some things cannot be, it's as simple as that.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She said love her or be tortured by her. I replied, "Torture would be less painful."She didn't realize that I'm a true romantic.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A can’t in a can—it’s carbonated failure that’s ready to drink. It tastes like the back half of love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My love burns for you like I’m an arsonist and marshmallows-on-sticks salesman. $2.99 each, or 5 for $10.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Nostalgia is being blind to the bad and only remembering the good. Thinking about all the love I had for her is a positively Helen-Kelleresque experience.

Author: Jandy Nelson,  I'll Give You the Sun
Quote: People die, I think, but your relationship with them doesn't. It continues and is ever-changing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I think I’m mouth blind and that’s why all food tastes bland. The only things that have any flavor are the words I love you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Behold, the number five is at hand. Grab it and shake and harness the power of networking.

Author: Graham Greene,  The Ministry of Fear
Quote: But it is impossible to go through life without trust; that is to be imprisoned in the worst cell of all, oneself.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I lost interest in her because she said the wrong thing. She said nothing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I miss her like 0, 1, 1, 2, 3, and 5 misses 8. When we made love, our two bodies formed one spiral that seemed to cycle to the sky.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Go sip on gossip, and leave the coffee talk for me to chug. I’ll be in the kitchen, giggling like a schoolgirl if you need me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When it’s raining, instead of using an umbrella, try holding an empty drinking glass above your head. That’s exactly how I thirst for your love.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: I love you. I hate you. I like you. I hate you. I love you. I think you’re stupid. I think you’re a loser. I think you’re wonderful. I want to be with you. I don’t want to be with you. I would never date you. I hate you. I love you…..I think the madness started the moment we met and you shook my hand. Did you have a disease or something?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ve only been in love one time, I said as I held up my pinky finger. I could have held up my index finger, but I wasn’t in love that long.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To show you I love you, I bought you an antique watch. You can tell it's old because it doesn't even work. I got a great deal on it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: Francis Bacon has the most delicious last name ever, followed closely by Johnny Scrambledeggs. I make love like those two guys make breakfast out of family reunions.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: That point in the sky where yellow meets blue, that’s a handshake I want to see at a #networking event. Sunglasses sold separately.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I went to Hallmark, but they don’t sell corridors there. I did, however, find a card that perfectly summed up our relationship. The card was blank.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Be mindful and heartempty, because you've got no love left in it due to you having given it all away.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I just developed a gun that shoots mustaches. Sometimes a disguise can be deadly, especially if it’s your love you’re trying to camouflage.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When you give everything and expect nothing in return, only then will you be in a position to gain anything. When you love loving, you give because giving is getting. Giving is a gift unto itself, and when you realize this you understand that you can’t network if you can’t love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Tennis is the only sport with love in the score, and that makes it the most romantic. I would be a player, but I wisely use the net to go fishing instead.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The love of my life has made me the happiest man ever. This ever-smiling man/mannequin is so happy because he’s got no brain, and in this way is identical to anyone who still rah-rahs for either a Republican or a Democrat.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: During my darkest hour, life threw me some curves. Thankfully they were in the shape of a woman’s body.

Author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack
Quote: All I want from you is to trust me with what little you can, and grow in loving people around you with the same love I share with you. It's not your job to change them, or to convince them. You are free to love without an agenda.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m passionate about being compassionate. It takes a lot to give of yourself, and that’s why it’s such a gift—for both the recipient and the giver.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The word very will vary in muchiness. I love you very much, and that won’t vary from day to day.

Author: Diane Von Furstenberg
Quote: The most important relationship in your life is the relationship you have with yourself. Because no matter what happens, you will always be with yourself.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Never give up on someone with a mental illness. When "I"is replaced by "We", illness becomes wellness.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: Our love was a two-person game. At least until one of us died, and the other became a murderer.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: You will never find the real truth among people that are insecure or have egos to protect. Truth over time becomes either guarded or twisted as their perspective changes; it changes with the seasons of their shame, love, hope or pride.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: A beautiful thing happens when we start paying attention to each other. It is by participating more in your relationship that you breathe life into it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have rubbed shoulders with the rich, the powerful, and the armless. It’s how to network when handshakes aren’t an option.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have two hands, so when I’m networking and I meet two new people, is it OK to shake both their hands at once? Or would it be more appropriate to organize a group hug?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have two friends, Steve and Martin. But I'd happily replace both for the friendship of Steve Martin.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My advice to aspiring writers is to read more, write more, and network more. More, more, and more. Then, after you've done all that, do it some more.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I asked for info, and he offered it for a price. Now I’m selling him my security services, and if he doesn’t pay me, I’m going to give him a karate lesson—for free.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: He’s right-handed, so I told him to draw his self-portrait with his left hand, because it’d look so ugly it’d look realistic. Since he’s a DC politician, I figured a little reality was needed in his life.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  New Order
Quote: I suppose it’s not a social norm, and not a manly thing to do — to feel, discuss feelings. So that’s what I’m giving the finger to. Social norms and stuff…what good are social norms, really? I think all they do is project a limited and harmful image of people. It thus impedes a broader social acceptance of what someone, or a group of people, might actually be like.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Is it easier to get you to do what I want with a fist to your face, or a gentle pat on the back and a handshake? Let this be a lesson in power.

Author: Bernard Branson
Quote: Rejection is an opportunity for your selection.

Author: Alain de Botton
Quote: Intimacy is the capacity to be rather weird with someone - and finding that that's ok with them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She had eyes like sunsets, and every time she blinked it felt like the end of the world, otherwise known as night.

Author: Fred Rogers,  The World According to Mister Rogers: Important Things to Remember
Quote: Mutual caring relationships require kindness and patience, tolerance, optimism, joy in the other's achievements, confidence in oneself, and the ability to give without undue thought of gain.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Midnight is Hellen-Kelleresque, so if you ask me if I’m seeing anybody, I’ll ask you what time it is. Answers are always between 12:01 AM to 11:59 PM.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I am a fisherman among farmers, and as a farmer what I grow is tired of waiting for her to love me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I just got done digging a hole shaped like a human body. But I have no idea what to bury. I’ll probably hide all my love for you, like I would with any other treasure.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My cat is ignorant of the law. But then so am I. That means I am not his master, because we are both slaves.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: You think that holding someone hard will bring them closer. You think that you can hold them so hard that you'll still feel them, embossed on you, when you pull away.Every time Eleanor pulled away from Park, she felt the gasping loss of him.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Don't let a thief into your house three times. The first time was enough. The second time was a chance. The third time means you're stupid.

Author: pleasefindthis,  I Wrote This For You
Quote: You can be in love and you can be in a relationship. But they’re not always the same thing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I want to sprint into her open arms, but I run as fast as two shoes tied together and thrown over a telephone wire. I’m like Roger Bannister, now that he’s in a wheelchair.

Author: pleasefindthis,  I Wrote This For You
Quote: I could’ve sworn I was telling the truth when I told you I didn’t miss you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: We made love like flamingoes are pink. You know what else was pink? My cheeks, because I was so embarrassed when I found out that she was the wrong woman.

Author: Henry Miller,  Tropic of Cancer
Quote: And for that one moment of freedom you have to listen to all that love crap... it drive me nuts sometimes... I want to kick them out immediately... I do now and then. But that doesn't keep them away. They like it, in fact. The less you notice them the more they chase after you. There's something perverse about women... they're all masochists at heart.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Dreaming is for lovers
Quote: I had a dream about you. Our relationship faded from red to white, and somewhere in the middle, in the pink zone, I told you I loved you and you returned it. However, at white, our relationship went black and I sought red in the arms of another woman.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I want a moon canoe, because have you ever tried paddling through dirt? Love is a journey, and I try to travel as efficiently as I can.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: Words were weapons, his father had taught him that, and he'd wanted to hurt Clary more than he'd ever wanted to hurt any girl. In fact, he wasn't sure he had ever wanted to hurt a girl before. Usually he just wanted them, and then he wanted them to leave him alone.

Author: Graeme Simsion,  The Rosie Project
Quote: But why, why, why can't people just say what they mean?

Author: Deb Caletti,  Stay
Quote: I've heard that people stand in bad situations because a relationship like that gets turned up by degrees. It is said that a frog will jump out of a pot of boiling water. Place him in a pot and turn it up a little at a time, and he will stay until he is boiled to death. Us frogs understand this.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Dreaming is for lovers
Quote: I had a dream about you. We went for a walk, though we didn’t hold hands because we went in separate directions. As I walked alone I thought about how you had the funniest way of showing affection to me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you convert a shower curtain to a dress, I’ll wear my waterproof dancing shoes. Together we’ll move so fluidly people will line up to get cleansed.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Ultimately the bond of all companionship, whether in marriage or in friendship, is conversation, and conversation must have a common basis, and between two people of widely different culture the only common basis possible is the lowest level.

Author: Françoise Sagan
Quote: Love lasts about seven years. That's how long it takes for the cells of the body to totally replace themselves.

Author: Justina Chen
Quote: He knew me in all the ways that truly mattered: the shape of my fears, the contours of my dreams.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You
Quote: When you're here, I'm there for you. And when you're there, I'm here for you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her and I, we have a two chairs and a table kind of love. You should pull up a feeling and have a seat.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I wouldn’t feel great if you left me alone, but I wouldn’t feel bad either. I’d feel good, like I always do, which has nothing to do with you, even if you’ll have nothing to do with me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: It’s better if you don’t come at all, then come and act like you don’t want to be here. The same applies to there, when I’m there, which is also confusingly here, though it’s not here it’s there.

Author: Brian Andreas
Quote: If you're right & I'm not, I'm going to be hell to live with, she said. So, you better think about that next time you want to be right.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  We Had A #Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. You took a cruise, and I took a canoe. I paddled alongside your ship out into the Atlantic Ocean and down to the Caribbean. I shouted “I love you” the whole way, but you couldn’t hear me, probably because that man you were with was talking the whole time.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Silence is expansive, filling up a whole room in seconds, like a balloon filled with awkwardness. It’s amazing how saying nothing can be so different from having nothing to say.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  Tender is the Night & The Last Tycoon
Quote: If you spend your life sparing people’s feelings and feeding their vanity, you get so you can’t distinguish what should be respected in them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Knocking on a door is so violent. Talk on the door. Try to get it to open up through communication, not violence.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  I had a dream about you 2
Quote: I had a dream about you. We were running on the beach, holding hands. It was a nude beach, but we were the only ones wearing clothes. You wore a bikini, and I wore my dead grandma’s dress—with my grandma still in it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ll mark up my services 200%, and then offer them to you at a 50% discount—because I like you so much. That’s the Mother-in-law Discount.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I knocked on her door twice. The second time was from the inside. That’s how love works. At first you want in, and then you want out.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A sofa on an elevator would be like a slow roller coaster where you get to work on your small talk skills. Oh yes, I am an adrenaline junky.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I think about her sometimes, and wonder what she’s doing and who she’s doing it with. I suppose I could just stalk her Facebook page like a normal person, but that doesn’t seem as romantic as surveillance and GPS tracking.

Author: Daphne Rose Kingma,  Finding True Love: The 4 Essential Keys to Bring You the Love of Your Life
Quote: Be sure it's your real self you're showing. Because it is your real self that needs to be loved.

Author: Rachel Machacek,  The Science of Single: One Woman's Grand Experiment in Modern Dating, Creating Chemistry, and Finding L ove
Quote: I believe with all my heart that the cliches are true, that we are our own best friends and best company, and that if you're not right for yourself, it's impossible to be right for anyone.

Author: Greg Behrendt,  He's Just Not That Into You: The No-Excuses Truth to Understanding Guys
Quote: ..he may love you, he may miss you, but ultimately he's just not that into you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Relationships are like water. If you grab tight, clamping and clenching to gain control, you’ll lose it all. Instead, cup your hand gently, so she feels free to drink until her thirst is quenched.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You
Quote: It’s easier to hide your smoking habit on a foggy day. Let that be a lesson for you and your secret lover.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: Love is a bronze statue sinking in quicksand. But if I hand you a lasso, will you try to save the statue—or use the lasso to hang yourself? If you need me, I’ll be here to kick the chair out from under your feet.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m an only child, and therefore I gave birth to my parents, because if it weren’t for me, they wouldn’t even be parents.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I held her gaze as I held her in my arms. With all that holding I couldn’t hold on to the moment, and it slipped past me into the lonely past.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: When you say "I"and "my"too much, you lose the capacity to understand the "we"and "our".

Author: Jarod Kintz,  At even one penny, this book would be overpriced. In fact, free is too expensive, because you'd still waste time by reading it.
Quote: I want a 100% kind of relationship, and I’m willing to give it 50%.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Combine a fog machine and a cotton candy maker to create delicious mystery. This is the heart of romance.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: She asked if I loved another woman, so I answered honestly and said, “Dinner was great, but I could go for dessert.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A follow-up letter is best when not written on the back of a suicide note. Remember this next time you’re at a networking event, unless your new connection is a mortician.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
