Quote: You don’t need batteries for an introduction. Buy my Networking in a Box today and see for yourself. (Handshakes sold separately.)

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The summer temperature outside was 45 degrees, so I turned 45 degrees and went right back inside. It was so cold outside because that’s where all her love for me was.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: She was a beautiful dreamer. The kind of girl, who kept her head in the clouds, loved above the stars and left regret beneath the earth she walked on.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: A windmill has arms, but does not hug. Where’s the love?

Author: Charles Dickens
Quote: A man is lucky if he is the first love of a woman. A woman is lucky if she is the last love of a man.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: We made love like a goat has four legs like a table. If your dining room table can walk, it’s best to eat while sitting in wheelchairs.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Networking is more quality, and less quantity. It’s better to form a solid connection with one new person, than a liquid connection with ten. You don’t want people to think you drink too much.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Me and her, we’re both hiding who we really are. This is a common practice. It’s called dating.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Intern
Quote: Please, touch me, I pray.

Author: Nicole Krauss,  The History of Love
Quote: We met each other when we were young, before we knew enough about disappointment, and once we did we found we reminded each other of it.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: Single is no longer a lack of options – but a choice. A choice to refuse to let your life be defined by your relationship status but to live every day Happily and let your Ever After work itself out.

Author: Timothy Keller
Quote: Falling in love in a Christian way is to say,'I am excited about your future and I want to be part of getting you there. I'm signing up for the journey with you. Would you sign up for the journey to my true self with me? It's going to be hard but I want to get there.

Author: Chuck Klosterman,  Sex, Drugs, and Cocoa Puffs: A Low Culture Manifesto
Quote: I once loved a girl who almost loved me, but not as much as she loved John Cusack.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Dreaming is for lovers
Quote: I had a dream about you. Flowers were overflowing in the cemetery, so we decided to have a picnic there. You brought apple pie, and I brought my Aunt Mildred, who’d been dead for some time and I just hadn’t gotten around to disposing of her body. I thought you’d think me both efficient and romantic, but it turns out you didn’t. You only saw the romantic side of my action.

Author: Frances O'Roark Dowell,  The Secret Language of Girls
Quote: A friend is someone whose face you can see in the dark.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You are not your body. You are the sum of all your actions, and they live on after your body dies. You may be mortal, but your brand is eternal.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: #Networking is people looking for people looking for people. As for me, I’m more of a birdwatcher.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Last weekend I went out of my comfort zone to go hang out with people I’d only heard about, and I met one new person who turned out to be a very valuable contact. I should try networking at my family reunions more often, because that’s how I finally met my dad.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I make friends as easily as water freezes in an active volcano. Remember: handshakes feel more natural if you leave your rubber gloves at home. Unless you enjoy networking in public restrooms.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The business of business is people, not products or services. Take care of the people, and the people will take care of you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Money is not equal for all people. A strong personal brand adds more lift and leverage. One dollar from me may buy a soda from a car dealership, but one dollar from Justin Bieber may get him a Ferrari. And they'd pay him to drive away.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Lightning doesn’t thunder twice. Let that be a lesson in love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love you the way ice melts in vodka—slowly, seamlessly, and invisibly. It’s a feel-good feeling whether you see it or not.

Author: Graham Greene,  The Ministry of Fear
Quote: Her face looked ugly in the attempt to avoid tears; it was an ugliness which bound him to her more than any beauty could have done. It isn't being happy together, he thought as though it were a fresh discovery, that makes one love--it's being unhappy together.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you want to steal my heart, you must realize it's not a one-time heist. This theft will take every minute of the rest of your life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: With any new business deal, don’t think about how much you can afford to get—think about how much you can afford to give. A spirit of giving will allow you to get.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You
Quote: I don’t mind waiting rooms. I’m waiting on the love of my life, so I may as well have a seat, right?

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: I'm not crying because of you; you're not worth it. I'm crying because my delusion of who you were was shattered by the truth of who you are.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The size of your sighs tell how deeply you’re in love. How I feel is very much like a stressed and distressed midget trying to breathe.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I sympathize with a mother who has three mouths to feed—especially if two of those mouths are on her face. With a woman like that I’d listen twice as hard for doublespeak. I’m pretty accustomed to picking up on political rhetoric.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Man is solid, not liquid. But with the fluid nature of networking, my personal brand would grow faster if I would just go with the flow.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. We installed Dr. Robert Jarvik’s artificial heart in a mannequin and brought it to life, only to later kill it because a creature that’s all fake heart and no brain is what’s commonly called a “politician,” and must be destroyed.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Your personal brand should be like water: not only clear, but transparent to the public. People thirst for that, and they will drink you up.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: In high school I used to write my love notes backwards, so she'd have to flip the paper upside-down to read it. Either that or read it in a mirror, so she can see herself as I see her, and see why I admire her.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: How would your life be different if…You approached all relationships with authenticity and honesty? Let today be the day…You dedicate yourself to building relationships on the solid foundation of truth and authenticity.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Like a ballet dancer, she keeps me on my toes. This dance we're doing, it keeps me so fit I know she's a perfect fit for me.

Author: Dora J. Arod,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. You were an escalator, and I was a flight of stairs. You thought I was a Luddite, and I thought I was as ostrich, because I hadn’t figured out how to put the fly in flight. One day you broke down, and then you saw that you and I weren’t so different after all.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Losing your mind is preferable to losing your woman, because if you lose your woman you will also lose your mind, and then you’re left with nothing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I spoke like a spoke on a wheel, as I went around and around without actually saying what I wanted to say. I was love flustered.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The fragrance of romance is gratitude. Nothing says I love you like saying I love you. Sure, it’s better to show your love, but why not also say it?

Author: Jan Neruda,  Prague Tales
Quote: Men are jealous of every woman, even when they don’t have the slightest interest in her themselves.

Author: Emily Giffin,  Heart of the Matter
Quote: I think of how each person in a marriage owes it to the other to find individual happiness, even in a shared life. That this is the only way to grow together, instead of apart.

Author: Gayle Roper,  Shadows on the Sand
Quote: Find a woman who makes you feel more alive. She won't make life perfect but she'll make it infinitely more interesting. And then love her with all that's in you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  If you bring the booze and food, I'll bring the thirst and hunger
Quote: Word of mouth—it's more powerful, more convincing, and more audible than word of hand. If you need me, I’ll be in the audience clapping.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Betrayal is an ironic thing. He or she betrays you then you betray yourself. You think you’re showing strength with your anger, but in reality you’re showing how much you still care.

Author: Dorothy Koomson,  My Best Friend's Girl
Quote: Share too much and someone can hurt you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She plants love, and she grows roses. The fragrance of romance comes from the blossom that blooms in the heart.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The strands of DNA are like strings, and it’s as if I am a walking guitar, a musical being whose vibration can be heard as love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My cup is full of air. I should empty it and fill it with love. Or coffee, as the two are synonymous to me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The roses of romance grow when you water your relationship with gratitude. Love will bloom and blossom when you recognize the awesome.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love may make you feel blue, love may make you feel green, and sometimes love may even make you feel turquoise or teal. Depression and envy get all the pretty shades of description, and I love that, but in a pink/purple kind of way.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The word long is short, and so is the word short, but why is the word love as long as long? Shouldn’t it be longer?

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: Human relationships always help us to carry on because they always presuppose further developments, a future - and also because we live as if our only task was precisely to have relationships with other people.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Ink is drinkable and printable. The words “I love you” don’t take up much space, but they can quench your thirst forever.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The going rate for love is going away. And the more you go away, the more expensive it gets.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: Water can be as hard as ice and as soft as fog, which is why my love is so drinkable, because it is fluid and forgiving. It's easy to love until there's nothing left. Eventually, the water runs out, the ice melts, and the fog fades into an abyss.-Jarod Kintz and Karen Quan

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My love is powdered sunshine. Just add water. (Warning: Do NOT attempt to snort it or distribute as a healthy cocaine substitute.)

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She wants to teach me to dance, but how do you instruct water to flow? I'm so fluid all you can do is swim in my moves and drink my essence.

Author: Karen Quan,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: My heart is burning a hole in my chest and every time you speak to me, it keeps sinking, and I'm left with nothing but ashes. I wish she were talking to me, because the more she speaks to me, the more my heart flutters like a rising phoenix.-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz

Author: Kim Gruenenfelder,  A Total Waste of Makeup
Quote: I'm tired of waiting by the phone, and second-guessing what a guy says and trusting someone not to hurt me. Again. I've been storming the relationship castle for fifteen years, and I still don't have my prince. I've got a bunch of battle scars from the field and I want to go home and nurse my wounds. I don't want to fight anymore.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My love for you grows daily, and all it takes is exposure to your sunny disposition, coupled with watering it with coffee.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I sell soap. Buy two bars and get a FREE shower. (Water not included.) Act within the next 15 minutes and I’ll even throw in the towel. I quit!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My acquaintances aren’t worth the aqua I drink after they leave me thirsting for something more meaningful. I don’t want refillable relationships—I want connections so deep they are black abysses.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To be angry is easy, but to forgive is hard. That's why to love is easy, and to love is hard. I try to be so hard that I'm soft, like a liquid rock, fluid and forgiving, but unmovable in my resolve.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her love was too cold, like an anti-oven. That's called a freezer, and sometimes it burns food. She gave me heartburn, just like coffee, and it really woke me up to the reality of relationships.

Author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"
Quote: Don’t spoil me with your lies, love me with your truth.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Water is translucent, but not invisible. But a glass half full is half translucent, half invisible, and you cannot drink what you cannot see, which may be why I am so thirsty for her love.

Author: Anirban Bose,  Bombay Rains, Bombay Girls
Quote: The desire to love someone always exceeds the desire to be loved by someone & that's exactly why we end up loving the person who doesn't deserve that LOVE.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you find yourself thirsting for my love, don’t forget that I sell straws in a variety of flavors. What is the price of romance? Good question. Today only it’s on sale for half-off wholesale prices. Everything must go. My entire inventory of straws is being liquidated.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Either I will love you, or I will love you if and only if you love me in return. I prefer the former.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: I know I love her, because when I see her my heart beats like a drum. If she played guitar and sang, we could start a band.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Trying to hide my feelings to avoid getting hurt just ends up hurting not only myself—but also the person I am hiding my feelings from.

Author: Michael Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night. The champagne was non-alcoholic. You didn't notice, and laughed at my jokes anyway.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: White letters plus white paper equals invisibility. Just because you can’t see my love for you, doesn’t mean I didn’t write about it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My I love yous were watered down, which was how I was able to grow such a beautiful garden. I’m a relationship farmer, and I’m growing as a person.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Let me just pause a minute and drink in this moment. And if you film it, I’ll be able to get free refills for life.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  What Happened to Goodbye
Quote: You want to take me to a movie?"I asked. "Well, not really,"he said. "What I really want is for you to be my girlfriend. But I thought saying that might scare you off.

Author: Karen Quan,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: She was stuck in between two worlds while her heart was pulling them both together. In a perfect world, she'd have both, or none at all. The symbol for love is two circles trying to merge in a Venn diagram that comes to a point down below, and only mostly separate are the two orbs one whole heart.-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My goal is to be as forgiving as a man with amnesia, but love as if I remember and cherish all the things you do that make me smile.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: After soul searching, I found myself. Then I found myself giving of myself to a charity that finds missing children. It's great to be found.

Author: Katherine Owen,  Not To Us
Quote: There are all kinds of ways for a relationship to be tested, even broken, some, irrevocably; it’s the endings we’re unprepared for.

Author: Ian Fleming,  Casino Royale
Quote: People are islands,' she said. 'They don't really touch. However close they are, they're really quite separate. Even if they've been married for fifty years.

Author: Brian K. Vaughan,  Buffy the Vampire Slayer: No Future for You
Quote: They hurt you. You hurt 'em back. Or maybe it is the other way around. Whatever. Someday you might find a way to forgive each other. But it won't be like it used to 'cause that pain never really goes away.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Attachments
Quote: I didn't know someone could love me like this,"she said. "Could love me and love me and love me without...needing space."Lincoln wasn't asleep. He rolled on top of her."There's no air in space,"he said.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you fear rejection, you won’t embrace acceptance. But don’t push yourself onto others, because they won’t pull you close.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She cuts me deep with her words, with her withholding of words, and with her knife. I’m not sure which is the most painful.

Author: Amanda Mosher,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: When the world is cold, use bridges for firewood. And for extra warmth, give off an aura of love, and you won't need a bridge, because the other side will come to you.-Amanda Mosher and Jarod Kintz

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The Sacred and The Scared. Which of these two categories does your love fall under? I should write a love poem on a rolled-up scroll so you’d know which one categorizes mine.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To get people to notice you, you must be unique. If I were invisible, everybody would see me for who I am as a person.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Gold is liquid sunlight frozen in time, and that’s why I love the way ice melts in vodka. I also love the way ice melts in vodka. I’ll have another shot, if you’ll reload the revolver.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Message in a Bottle
Quote: Theresa, I know there's a part of you that believes you can change someone, but the reality is that you can't. You can change yourself, and Garrett can change himself, but you can't do it for him.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I am so extreme that I do parkour like a caterpillar gyrates. My movements are slow and methodical, but eventually my free running takes flight. I love the same exact way, and my romance has the essence of a butterfly.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can sell you wine and I can sell you flowers, but I can't sell you romance, because that comes from your heart, and it's free.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A love story in six words: Hello. Goodbye. In between was marriage.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Poor is the man who thinks money makes him wealthy. Love is the true treasure, and the more you give away, the more you have.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When she tried to seduce me, I got suspicious, thinking she was just after my massive fortune. Then I relaxed, when I remembered I'm poor.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you merge an emergency with a mannequin, that’s how I look at networking events. To make each handshake more feel more personal, I try to wear the thinnest rubber gloves I can find.

Author: Dan Pearce,  Single Dad Laughing
Quote: Share your weaknesses. Share your hard moments. Share your real side. It'll either scare away every fake person in your life or it will inspire them to finally let go of that mirage called "perfection,"which will open the doors to the most important relationships you'll ever be a part of.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I used to gorge on gorgeous women, but now I look for things that can’t be seen with the eyes, but are only detected by the heart. This is love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To wait on love is to tie a weight on your heart and slowly drown. Why sink when you can fly by freely giving love away?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She’s ignoring my texts. Maybe she’s dead. Oh, I certainly hope so. I’d hate to think she’s being deliberately unresponsive.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: People don't care what I wear or don't wear, and even if I don't wear anything people will cover for me if they know that I care about them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Titanic would never have sunk if it were made out of a sink.
Quote: Kevin Love has a last name that sums up my feelings for you. But then again, so does Renaldo Letsfucktonight.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You can use your mouth to speak the words I love you, or you can use your mouth to kiss me and transport love from your mind to my heart.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I once tried to light a joint with a fire ant, but what did I know? I was high on glue and in the third grade, just like grandpa.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: People with money have to worry about who their real friends are. I don’t have that problem for two reasons: I don’t have any money, and I don’t have any friends.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Man has two legs and chairs have four, because we were made to stand out, not sit down—or be sat on. You are your brand—you are not a piece of furniture. Well, this applies to everyone except my grandma, but she’s dead, so she really doesn’t mind being used as a coat rack.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love is a process, either growing or shrinking, but never stagnant. My love for you was David, and now it is Goliath. Also, my love for you was Goliath, and now it is David.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her love is more aww than awe, and even if were awesome, I want aweall, not merely some awe. I’m greedy for the amazing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I give 110% in love. If that seems absurd, just know that I used presidential voting machines to calculate that number. It's totally legit.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She said she'd love me forever. That was two days ago, so I should probably ask her again if she still feels the same way.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Lullaby
Quote: No matter how much you love someone, you still want to have you own way.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I could make tea out of your love, would it be hot, or iced? Would it be black, or green? Would it be sweet, or unsweet? Would you offer free refills?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Every guy says he's not like every guy, thus proving he is like every guy. Show me a guy who's different, and I'll tell you to stop pointing at me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I mined my mind, and I found no love. My heart is where excavation yields gold, and if you dig me as much as I dig you, we can both get rich.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I'm here at The Container Store looking for something large enough to hold all my love for her. It's a flood, so I hope they sell Shipping Container Ships.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I keep my motivational book collection in the fridge. Hey, Who Moved My Cheese?! Did somebody let grandpa out of his cage again?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Lying in bed listless, I wrote a list. I then had a list, but I was still listless. Perhaps because my list was of all the things I love, and every entry was you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Our love, that’s real. Our currency, the dollar, that’s imaginary. Invest in us, and I promise you that you won’t lose your life’s savings.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can't throw away cologne because that is Nostalgia in a Bottle, the scent of yesterday, and it reminds me of her more clearly than her picture.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have a Rubik’s Cube for a rearview mirror, because the past is the only time puzzle I can solve. My love for her only looks clear there.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I chased the chaste, and they got scared and scurried. Then I stood still and loved where I was at, and all approached without fear of reproach.

Author: Amanda Mosher,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: Angels walk amongst those with broken wings. Those with broken wings only need to be given a little love before their hearts can flutter and take flight once again.-Amanda Mosher and Jarod Kintz

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A relationship is a sales process, and sometimes you must buy to sell, and when you sell it is to the benefit of both of you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: What is the shape of love? Is it shaped like you? For me it is, but for you maybe it is shaped like me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She’s twelve hours in the future, and exactly half a world away. No matter how hard I try, I will always be a part of her past.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A kangaroo would jump better if instead of legs, it had a trampoline under its torso. And there would be no depression, because it would bounce right back.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Catching Fire
Quote: Shame isn't a strong enough word for what I feel. "You could live a hundred lifetimes and not deserve him, you know,"Haymitch says.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To fast track your business and become the Roger Bannister of personal branding, be a connector, accumulator, accelerator and facilitator of relationships.

Author: Rollo May,  The Courage to Create
Quote: Intimacy requires courage because risk is inescapable. We cannot know at the outset how the relationship will affect us. Like a chemical mixture, if one of us is changed, both of us will be. Will we grow in self-actualization, or will it destroy us? The one thing we can be certain of is that if we let ourselves fully into the relationship for good or evil, we will not come out unaffected.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The wealthier I get, the more money I will have to not have, because my goal in getting is giving, and nothing is better than charity.

Author: Karen Quan,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: I'll sleep forever and meet you in my dreams; it'll hurt less anyway. But the pain of losing you was worth the pleasure of having you, and I rest in bed knowing you'll know for the rest of your life what you are missing.-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz

Author: Gretchen Rubin,  The Happiness Project: Or Why I Spent a Year Trying to Sing in the Morning, Clean My Closets, Fight Right, Read Aristotle, and Generally Have More Fun
Quote: Laughter is more than just a pleasurable activity...When people laugh together, they tend to talk and touch more and to make eye contact more frequently.

Author: André Breton
Quote: Tell me whom you haunt and I’ll tell you who you are.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: How’s my mom? My mother’s well, like a painting—a Motherwell.

Author: Karen Quan,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: I'll miss looking through the forest–your green and hazel eyes. I love the way they shimmered and changed shade with your mood, and how I could see the desire in your emerald gaze.-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ve spent a lifetime learning to love—the lifetime of a chameleon. But hey, I’ve learned a lot in the last year, though you couldn’t tell because I camouflage my feelings.

Author: Alessandra Torre
Quote: The true measure of a man is how he treats you when others are not looking.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My past is black and my future is blank. My only canvas is the present. The best color to paint with is love.

Author: Greg Behrendt,  He's Just Not That Into You: The No-Excuses Truth to Understanding Guys
Quote: He doesn't need to be reminded you're great.

Author: Emily Giffin,  Something Blue
Quote: People generally didn't cheat in good relationships.

Author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack
Quote: Life takes a bit of time and a lot of relationship.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: The greatest love stories are not those in which love is only spoken, but those in which it is acted upon.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  Someone Like You
Quote: Don't be a fool. Don't give up something important to hold onto someone who can't even say they love you.

Author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack
Quote: So many believe that it is love that grows, but it is the knowing that grows and love simply expands to contain it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: When we were we, with you is the only place I wanted to be. When we were just two separate souls, I used to dream of a place where we'd come together as one.-Jarod Kintz and Karen Quan

Author: Jean Kwok,  Girl in Translation
Quote: What a relationship looks like on the outside isn't the same as what it's like on the inside. You can be more in love with someone in your mind than with the person you see every day.

Author: Shannon L. Alder,  300 Questions LDS Couples Should Ask Before Marriage
Quote: If he can't handle you at your worst then he does not deserve you at your best. Real love means seeing beyond the words spoken out of pain, and instead seeing a person's soul.

Author: Daphne du Maurier,  Rebecca
Quote: Either you go to America with Mrs. Van Hopper or you come home to Manderley with me.""Do you mean you want a secretary or something?""No, I'm asking you to marry me, you little fool.

Author: John Mayer,  Continuum: Music by John Mayer
Quote: How dare you say it's nothing to me?Baby, you're the only light I ever saw.

Author: Boyz II Men
Quote: Because you let our love just fall apartYou no longer have my heart

Author: Orson Scott Card,  Children of the Mind
Quote: This emotion I'm feeling now, this is love, right?""I don't know. Is it a longing? Is it a giddy stupid happiness just because you're with me?""Yes,"she said."That's influenza,"said Miro. "Watch for nausea or diarrhea within a few hours.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I drink like a fish, and I swim in my thirst. I’m so parched for her love that I think I may drown in my desire.

Author: Robert Bloch,  Psycho
Quote: Funny how we take it for granted that we know all there is to know about another person, just because we see them frequently or because of some strong emotional tie.

Author: Courtney Cole,  Every Last Kiss
Quote: What was it about relationships that made you feel so vulnerable? Oh, right. A relationship. In any relationship, you put yourself out there. You exposed all of your sensitive nerve endings and your heart and you just had to hope that you trusted the right person.

Author: David Levithan,  How They Met, and Other Stories
Quote: Love doesn’t have to be on Valentine’s Day. It doesn’t have to be by the time you turn eighteen or thirty-three or fifty-nine. It doesn’t have to conform to whatever is usual. It doesn’t have to be kismet at once, or rhapsody by the third day.It just has to be. In time. In place. In spirt.It just has to be.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: When you loved someone and had to let them go, there will always be that small part of yourself that whispers, "What was it that you wanted and why didn't you fight for it?

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: Better to put your heart on the line, risk everything, and walk away with nothing than play it safe. Love is a lot of things, but “safe” isn’t one of them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The goodbad news is she only stole half. The badgood news is she stole half. And when it’s love that’s been stolen, a hole the size of half your heart feels like the whole thing has been taken.

Author: Hilary Winston,  My Boyfriend Wrote a Book About Me: And Other Stories I Shouldn't Share with Acquaintances, Coworkers, Taxi drivers, Assistants, Job Interviewers, Bikini Waxers, and Ex/Current/Future Boyfriends but Have
Quote: There’s nothing like that feeling of waiting for a guy. It’s the loneliest feeling in the world. Holding that cell phone in your hand as you take out the trash, use the bathroom, change the litter box. Fearful that the one second you aren’t looking will be when they call. Pathetic. And something I have done as recently as last week.

Author: M.A. Stacie,  Unwritten Rules
Quote: I don't deserve you. I'm not made for relationships. I know I'm going to fuck this up. I'm going to drive you away or do something to hurt you, and you'll be added to my list of people I screwed over. You should walk away now.

Author: شيرين هنائي,  صندوق الدمى
Quote: أريدك أن تعرف المزيد عن النساء مما لن تخبرك به واحده منهن.. إن النساء لا يطلبن الاهتمام ولكنهن يسعين إلى يجدن ذلك الرجل الذى يهتم بهن فعلا..

Author: Eartha Kitt
Quote: It’s all about falling in love with yourself and sharing that love with someone who appreciates you, rather than looking for love to compensate for a self love deficit.

Author: Anton Chekhov,  The Three Sisters
Quote: A woman can become a man's friend only in the following stages - first an acquantaince, next a mistress, and only then a friend.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title
Quote: Love is like a door knob that I’ve mistaken for a shower handle, and I’m trying to turn up the heat on our relationship, but the handle won’t turn and I’ve got shampoo in my eyes and my wetsuit is dry and I started crying just as the zookeeper asked me to leave.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: It takes guts to love with gusto. Most people love as if they wish they were invisible, and then they wonder why their affections go unnoticed.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Apparently I’m transparent—with my feelings, not with my body. I’m an emotional ghost, and if you can’t see my love for you it’s because it’s dead.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I grew a garden in her heart. There was plenty of space for flowers, because her heart was completely empty of love.

Author: David Richo
Quote: Trust in someone means that we no longer have to protect ourselves. We believe we will not be hurt or harmed by the other, at least not deliberately. We trust his or her good intentions, though we know we might be hurt by the way circumstances play out between us. We might say that hurt happens; it’s a given of life. Harm is inflicted; it’s a choice some people make.

Author: Meg Cabot,  When Lightning Strikes
Quote: You'll blow up a helicopter, but you won't go out with me? What is  wrong  with you?

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: When a person is punished for their honesty they begin to learn to lie.

Author: Amy Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night... you were a giant slinky and I watched you fall down the stairs.

Author: T. Rafael Cimino,  Table 21
Quote: Most don't deserve your tears... and the ones that do will never make you cry.

Author: Steve Toltz,  A Fraction of the Whole
Quote: Sometimes not talking is effortless, and other times it’s more exhausting than lifting pianos.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love deeply. I love long. I love wide and high. That's right, my love is interdimensional, and my vortex will heal your body and soul.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham,  The Painted Veil
Quote: Was it necessary to tell me that you wanted nothing in the world but me?'The corners of his mouth drooped peevishly.Oh, my dear, it's rather hard to take quite literally the things a man says when he's in love with you.'Didn't you mean them?'At the moment.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When I lost her I gained the future, because she was my past, and she freed me to become who I was born to be.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The sunset sky fades from blue to orange over Gainesville, Florida, and what I lost is less than what I gained. I gained love, I lost love, and if could do it all again, I would.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I believe the way to master my destiny is to serve others. If I raise up others, am I not also raised up?

Author: Hjalmar Söderberg,  Doctor Glas
Quote: We know so little about one another. We embrace a shadow and love a dream.

Author: Rob Bell,  Sex God: Exploring the Endless Connections Between Sexuality and Spirituality
Quote: Love is giving up control. It’s surrendering the desire to control the other person. The two—love and controlling power over the other person—are mutually exclusive. If we are serious about loving someone, we have to surrender all the desires within us to manipulate the relationship.

Author: Simone de Beauvoir,  The Second Sex
Quote: Two separate beings, in different circumstances, face to face in freedom and seeking justification of their existence through one another, will always live an adventure full of risk and promise."(p. 248)

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I haven't measured it, but I'll bet cat purrs vibrate at a healing frequency. Also, a whispered I love you almost certainly resonates with heart and DNA repair.

Author: Elliot Perlman
Quote: What is it about men that make women so lonely?

Author: Tanith Lee,  Wolf Star
Quote: I hate the way, once you start to know someone, care about them, their behavior can distress you, even when it's unreasonable and not your fault, even if you were really trying to be careful, tactful.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Love doesn't make the world go 'round; love is what makes the ride worthwhile.

Author: Michael Pollan,  The Omnivore's Dilemma: A Natural History of Four Meals
Quote: The single greatest lesson the garden teaches is that our relationship to the planet need not be zero-sum, and that as long as the sun still shines and people still can plan and plant, think and do, we can, if we bother to try, find ways to provide for ourselves without diminishing the world.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore
Quote: I remember one desolate Sunday night, wondering: Is this how I´m going to spend the rest of my life? Marrid to someone who is perpetually distracted and somewhat wistful, as though a marvelous party is going on in the next room, which but for me he could be attending?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She said she loved me, and I believed her, because she was looking directly at another man when she said it.

Author: Milan Kundera,  Laughable Loves
Quote: The girl was grateful to the young man for every bit of flattery; she wanted to linger for a moment in its warmth and so she said, 'You're very good at lying.''Do I look like a liar?''You look like you enjoy lying to women,' said the girl, and into her words there crept unawares a touch of the old anxiety, because she really did believe that her young man enjoyed lying to women.

Author: Jim Shepard
Quote: You get lonely, is what it is. A person's not supposed to go through life with absolutely nobody. It's not normal. The longer you go by yourself the weirder you get, and the weirder you get the longer you go by yourself. It's a loop and you gotta do something to get out of it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Love has no limitations. It cannot be measured. It has no boundaries. Although many have tried, love is indefinable.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Insanity is everyone expecting you not to fall apart when you find out everything you believed in was a lie.

Author: Mr. Big
Quote: Why be alone when we can be together babyYou can make my life worthwhileAnd I can make you start to smile

Author: bell hooks,  All About Love: New Visions
Quote: Relationships are treated like Dixie cups. They are the same. They are disposable. If it does not work, drop it, throw it away, get another.Committed bonds (including marriage) cannot last when this is the prevailing logic. Most of us are unclear about what to do to protect and strengthen caring bonds when our self-centered needs are not being met.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: We walked to meet each other up at the time of our love and then we have been irresistibly drifting in different directions, and there's no altering that.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  So many chairs, and no time to sit
Quote: For your birthday I got you some batteries. They’re dead, just like you’ll soon be.

Author: Mindy Kaling,  Is Everyone Hanging Out Without Me?
Quote: I think when men hear that women want a commitment, they think it means commitment to a romantic relationship, but that's not it. It's a commitment to not floating around anywhere. I want a guy who is entrenched in his own life.

Author: Boyz II Men
Quote: time made me stronger, you're no longer on my mind

Author: Julian Barnes,  Flaubert's Parrot
Quote: He feared me as many men fear women: because their mistresses (or their wives) understand them. They are scarcely adult, some men: they wish women to understand them, and to that end they tell them all their secrets; and then, when they are properly understood, they hate their women for understanding them.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Mark of Athena
Quote: Annabeth realized that if six of them went on these two quests, it would leave Percy alone on the ship with Coach Hedge, which was maybe not a situation a caring girlfriend should put him in. Nor was she eager to let Percy out of her sight again—not after they’d been apart for so many months.

Author: Amy Sedaris,  I Like You: Hospitality Under the Influence
Quote: Don't answer the door in a wedding dress and veil, he might not think you're joking.

Author: Michael Bassey Johnson
Quote: People will walk in and walk out of your life, but the one whose footstep made a long lasting impression is the one you should never allow to walk out.

Author: Louisa May Alcott,  Little Women
Quote: She preferred imaginary heroes to real ones, because when tired of them, the former could be shut up in the tin kitchen till called for, and the latter were less manageable.

Author: Aberjhani,  Visions of a Skylark Dressed in Black
Quote: If I say your voice is an amber waterfall in which I yearn to burn each day, if you eat my mouth like a mystical rose with powers of healing and damnation, If I confess that your body is the only civilization I long to experience… would it mean that we are close to knowing something about love?

Author: Erykah Badu
Quote: Never knew what a friendship was, Never knew how to really love, You can't be what I need you to, & I don't know why I fuck with you

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Often romantic relationships fail because you are trying to get someone to fall in love with the YOU that you never discovered.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: Death is the easy part, the hard part is living and knowing you could be so much more then you’re willing to be.

Author: Lorraine Zago Rosenthal,  Other Words for Love
Quote: I thought he should have realized sooner that important people don't show up very often, and you should hold on to them when they do. Maybe I was smarter than he was all along, because that was something I'd always known.

Author: Brené Brown,  The Gifts of Imperfection: Let Go of Who You Think You're Supposed to Be and Embrace Who You Are
Quote: When we fail to set boundaries and hold people accountable, we feel used and mistreated. This is why we sometimes attack who they are, which is far more hurtful than addressing a behavior or a choice.

Author: Brené Brown,  The Gifts of Imperfection: Let Go of Who You Think You're Supposed to Be and Embrace Who You Are
Quote: When we fail to set boundaries and hold people accountable, we feel used and mistreated. This is why we sometimes attack who they are, which is far more hurtful than addressing a behavior or a choice.

Author: Marilyn Suttle
Quote: Truth builds trust.

Author: Omar Khayyám,  Rubaiyat
Quote: To wisely live your life, you don't need to know muchJust remember two main rules for the beginning:You better starve, than eat whateverAnd better be alone, than with whoever.

Author: Charles Martin,  Chasing Fireflies: A Novel of Discovery
Quote: Never judge someone by their relatives.

Author: Jenny Trout,  Ashes to Ashes
Quote: I have to go. I have a finite amount of life left and I don't want to spend it arguing with you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I'm hanging on to her memory like Spanish moss on an ancient Florida oak, and unlike the sunset, my love won't fade.

Author: Kahlil Gibran,  Prophet Hb
Quote: love one another, but make not a bond of love: let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls. fill each other's cup but drink not from one cup. give one another of your bread but eat not from the same loaf sing and dance together and be joyous, but let each one of you be alone, even as the strings of a lute are alone though they quiver with the same music.

Author: Kirsten Hubbard,  Like Mandarin
Quote: You can't truly hate someone until you've cared about them. Until you've loved them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I was in love one time, I said as I held up my pinky. I would have held up my index finger, but I wasn't in love that long.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I found 20 dollars on the ground, I’d be willing to bet I’d find someone in desperate need of money that I could give it to. And I’d bet 20 dollars, so even after finding and giving away 20 dollars, I’d have made 20 dollars.

Author: Roman Payne,  Rooftop Soliloquy
Quote: Women writers make for rewarding (and efficient) lovers. They are clever liars to fathers and husbands; yet they never hold their tongues too long, nor keep ardent typing fingers still.

Author: Carol Rifka Brunt,  Tell the Wolves I'm Home
Quote: I need to figure out the secret. I need to work out how to keep things flying back to me instead of always flying away.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: A tamed woman will never leave her mark in the world.

Author: Myles Munroe,  Waiting and Dating
Quote: Solid character will reflect itself in consistent behavior, while poor character will seek to hide behind deceptive words and actions.

Author: David Levithan,  Boy Meets Boy
Quote: But I think we both knew, even then, that what we had was something even more rare, and even more meaningful. I was going to be his friend, and was going to show him possibilities. And he, in turn, would become someone I could trust more than myself.

Author: Nicole McKay,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night.. you were holding a pine cone and introducing him as Gerald.

Author: Gary Chapman,  The Five Love Languages: How to Express Heartfelt Commitment to Your Mate
Quote: Encouragement requires empathy and seeing the world from your spouse's perspective. We must first learn what is important to our spouse. Only then can we give encouragement. With verbal encouragement, we are trying to communicate, "I know. I care. I am with you. How can I help?"We are trying to show that we believe in him and in his abilities. We are giving credit and praise.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: I used to loathe ambivalence; now I adore it. Ambivalence is my new best friend.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Tweeting is talking into the abyss, filling a void in your life by avoiding real human contact.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love is a boomerang dripped in honey, in that it emanates from me just as surely as it will return to me. Still, I think I’d much rather wash my hands and be done with it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I would argue that unless the two people are in love, all sex is bad sex, because why eat cotton candy when you can have edible clouds? Sure, it seems sweet at the time, but that’s just a carnival and carnal rush and wears off quickly. But love adds an extra dimension that takes an earthy thing like sex and makes it absolutely heavenly.

Author: Anthony Robbins
Quote: Some of the biggest challenges in relationships come from the fact that most people enter a relationship in order to get something: they're trying to find someone who's going to make them feel good. In reality, the only way a relationship will last is if you see your relationship as a place that you go to give, and not a place that you go to take.

Author: Crystal Woods,  Write like no one is reading
Quote: I know I'm not going to be in your head all the time. But once you know me, I'll be forever in your heart.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She moves through my memory the way the gentle river waves turn the setting sun's rays into a nostalgic light show.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: In my memory her love shimmers, glimmers, and glitters the way light on black water reflects like diamonds, the treasure that was us.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: When relationships fail it is usually because someone chooses not to show up for the battle.

Author: Henry Miller
Quote: It is with the soul that we grasp the essence of another human being, not with the mind, nor even with the heart.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her love used to be my lighthouse, and now it feels like I'm treading water in the dark. I’ll bet as soon as I start swimming, the sun will rise and color the sky with the romance of rose.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace
Quote: In the best, the friendliest and simplest relations flattery or praise is necessary, just as grease is necessary to keep wheels turning.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love is 60% water, because a human being, the essence of love, is 60% water. But that’s the other 40% made up of? Easy—mint green tea and honey.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: There are only four times a year I love you: summer, fall, winter, and spring. I'll love you until the sun stops shining, until the clouds dissipate, when Mount Everest no longer has snow, and the flowers stop blooming.-Jarod Kintz and Karen Quan

Author: Nelson DeMille,  The General's Daughter
Quote: Basically, all women are nurturers and healers, and all men are mental patients to varying degrees.

Author: Emily Giffin,  Something Borrowed
Quote: We are one of those couples i used to watch, thinking to myself that I'd never be on the inside of something so special. I remember reassuring myself that it probably looked nicer than it actually was, I am happy to be wrong about that.

Author: Nora Roberts,  Tears of the Moon
Quote: You don't fix a man the way you do a fault in a pipe or a leak in a roof. You take him as he is, Mary Brenna, or you don't take him at all...adjustments can't be all made on one side, darling, else the balance goes off and what's being built just falls down.

Author: Rachel Gibson,  I'm In No Mood For Love
Quote: One of the most difficult things he'd ever done was turn away and leave her standing in the shadows.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A chance meeting in a Kansas City coffee shop may take me months of planning and twice a day visits for over a year. But I already have my stunned, surprised, and shocked speech rehearsed for the moment I act like I had no idea she would be there.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The memory of her love shimmers the way white light ripples gently on the midnight river, and I am currently thirsting to swim in the current that will flow downstream into her wading and waiting arms.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: Delusion detests focus and romance provides the veil.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ve never been in a yesterday quite like today. Seems like the perfect time to be in love.

Author: Ravi Zacharias,  I, Isaac, Take Thee, Rebekah: Moving from Romance to Lasting Love
Quote: Unless I understand the Cross, I cannot understand why my commitment to what is right must be precedence over what I prefer.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert
Quote: What if we just acknowledged that we have a bad relationship, and we stuck it out, anyway? What if we admitted that we make each other nuts, we fight constantly and hardly ever have sex, but we can't live without each other, so we deal with it? And then we could spend our lives together -- in misery, but happy to not be apart.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Once a Ponce a time she made me feel like a conquistador. Now her memory is just a breeze seen in swaying Spanish moss.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.
Quote: My grandpa died yesterday. I ought to know, because I shot him. So come, join me in the fight against patricide by killing your father’s father.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Write like no one is reading 3
Quote: I watch you like a mirror, because I see in you what I see in myself. Who we love is a reflection of who we are.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The sun rose and tinted the sky rose, that floral red teeming with romance, and it filtered in thoughts of the love I used to have for her.

Author: Joyce Meyer,  Battlefield of the Mind: Winning the Battle in Your Mind
Quote: Trust and faith bring joy to life and help relationships grow to their maximum potential.

Author: Tom Brokaw
Quote: In your pursuit of your passions, always be young. In your relationship with others, always be grown-up.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Become the leader of your life. Lead yourself to where you want to be. Breathe life back into your ambitions, your desires, your goals, your relationships.

Author: Graham Greene,  The Quiet American
Quote: Time has its revenges, but revenge seems so often sour. Wouldn’t we all do better not trying to understand, accepting the fact that no human being will ever understand another, not a wife with a husband, nor a parent a child? Perhaps that’s why men have invented God – a being capable of understanding.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Let’s do a 50-50 deal, with me getting 75% of the profits, and you getting the other half. That’s how we can both get the most value out of a relationship.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Vodka in the shape of a human body would be an excellent dancing partner. I'm a bring my own chaser kind of lover.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  What Happened to Goodbye
Quote: Oh for God's sake,' Heather said, 'I wish you two would just go out, fail miserably as a couple, and get it over with.

Author: Bauvard,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. I was sitting on your couch, relating my succession of ideas on subconscious influence. I asked you what they meant, and you told me that free associations were a bad way to advance my political career.

Author: Michael Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night. I could fly. I was going to use this power to impress you, but you were too heavy to carry, so I won you over with my personality instead

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: She is delightfully chaotic; a beautiful mess. Loving her is a splendid adventure.

Author: Bram Stoker,  The New Annotated Dracula
Quote: I suppose that we women are such cowards that we think a man will save us from fears, and we marry him.

Author: J.S.B. Morse,  Now and at the Hour of Our Death
Quote: A broken heart is just the growing pains necessary so that you can love more completely when the real thing comes along.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I want to love you down. I want to love you deep. I want to love you up. And I want to love you width all my heart. Now that is #4DFeeling.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The pink sunset reminds me of her, and the calm water matches the calm that images of her bring to my heart.

Author: Stephen King,  The Stand
Quote: Your first impulse is to share good news, your second is to club someone with it.

Author: Arthur C. Clarke,  2010: Odyssey Two
Quote: After their encounter on the approach to Jupiter, there would aways be a secret bond between them---not of love, but of tenderness, which is often more enduring.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage
Quote: With each reunion (we) had to learn each other all over again. There was always that nervous moment at the airport when I would stand there waiting for him to arrive, wondering, Will I still know him? Will he still know me?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Write like no one is reading 3
Quote: I cry, but not for myself. There’s too much sadness in this world to waste a moment with self-pity, when making others smile will also make me smile.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Flowers are aromatic and romantic, and they grow exactly the way love does—with plenty of light, and watered with affection.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My love has a flow like a flower, so it’s best if you water it with the fragrance of romance, which has the aroma of loyalty.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The heart pumps blood, a fluid, but it also pulses love, which is as liquid as a wave, and everyone wants a refill. My goal is to be a server.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Write like no one is reading 3
Quote: Everyone is different from each other, but that doesn’t mean everyone should be indifferent to each other.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: We had a lavender kind of love, so soothing and smooth, and if I could bottle up what we had, you'd want it all over your body.

Author: Jenny Han,  To All the Boys I've Loved Before
Quote: How was I supposed to know what’s real and what’s not? It feels like I’m the only one who doesn’t know the difference.

Author: Ellen Bass,  The Courage to Heal: A Guide for Women Survivors of Child Sexual Abuse
Quote: So often survivors have had their experiences denied, trivialized, or distorted. Writing is an important avenue for healing because it gives you the opportunity to define your own reality. You can say: This did happen to me. It was that bad. It was the fault & responsibility of the adult. I was—and am—innocent.” The Courage to Heal by Ellen Bass & Laura Davis

Author: Cecelia Ahern,  The Time of My Life
Quote: Truth is, something that I thought was perfect was taken away from me, and I never wanted perfect again. I wanted middle of the road, stuff I didn’t care about so that I couldn’t lose anything I really loved ever again.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The words I love you form an oral floral phrase that's so fragrant it can overpower even the most flagrantly foul-mouthed utterance.

Author: Rachel Machacek,  The Science of Single: One Woman's Grand Experiment in Modern Dating, Creating Chemistry, and Finding L ove
Quote: I'm terrified of getting involved with someone who disappoints me or leaves me empty and alone. I'm terrified of rejection, so I set my expectations so high that they can never be met, and I dig around with a magnifying glass looking for flaws in very person I date. There's always a flaw to exploit, and I'll find it so I never have to get too close.

Author: Lawrence Hill,  Someone Knows My Name
Quote: To gaze into another persons face is to do two things: to recognise their humanity and to assert your own.

Author: Jennifer Rardin,  Once Bitten, Twice Shy
Quote: I pictured Cupid sitting in a crappy little bar, drunk and depressed, while he moaned to the bartender, "That Jasmine Parks, gods, she pisses me off! Did you see what she just did? Totally blew off this immortal stud to play kiss-the-boo-boo with a fickle little rent-a-cop. Why? 'Cause she's the biggest chickenshit on the planet! I'm ready to toss my bow and pick up a bazooka!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Write like no one is reading 3
Quote: We must make love to find out how it’s made. I don’t know what the ingredients are, but I think we can make a batch or two by morning.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Write like no one is reading 3
Quote: I work in a secret whisper factory. It’s all very hush-hush. Her love for me could be found there, if it could be found at all, but it can’t, because it’s invisible.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: In a gust of guts and gusto, I told her of my love for her. Then, like a tornado, she spun what I said into something that terrorized Kansas.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Write like no one is reading 3
Quote: When traveling on foot through the Sahara Desert, be sure to pack several gallons of ice cream, and keep them close to your heart, because nothing, not even my love, can make that thing melt.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My heart can hold all the love you give me. If you need to quantify it to properly price it for sale, it would be one gallon.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I didn’t give her my full attention. The bottle was half full when she started drinking. Still, from it she grew distracted, so my farming technique worked.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: Don't. Don't let's pretend when there's no one around.

Author: Wayne W. Dyer
Quote: In any relationship in which two people become one, the end result is two half people.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Write like no one is reading 3
Quote: I thirst for love like a camel thirsts for water. I’m going through a desert right now, but I’m searching for the oasis of my life.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: The strength of a man isn't seen in the power of his arms. It's seen in the love with which he EMBRACES you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: I could be in the middle of a spiritual hurricane, my soul torn and tormented, but when I see you smile it's blue skies for miles. You give me a tsunami of emotions, and my heart is trying to find peace through crashing waves, but they always end up in a cyclone that never dies.-Jarod Kintz and Karen Quan

Author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Forever
Quote: I was trying to decide if you still had free will as a wolf. If I was a terrible person for planning to drug my girlfriend and drag her back to my house to keep in the basement.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Write like no one is reading 3
Quote: I'm going to sell Flash Bang Wow Fuzz (not a drill) in a bottle, but I’m not sure how to market it. Maybe as a drinkable alternative to love.

Author: Kamila Shamsie,  Broken Verses
Quote: There is no mystery-- that's the beauty of it. We are entirely explicable to each other, and yet we stay. What a miracle that is.

Author: Crystal Woods,  Dreaming is for lovers
Quote: I had a dream about you last night. I was alone on a dark night and you came to me as a firefly. I knew it was you because you were the brightest.

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  One Hundred Years of Solitude
Quote: One minute of reconciliation is worth more than a whole life of friendship!

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: I will never deny that life isn't fair. It seems as though when a woman leaves a man she is strong and independent, but when a man leaves a woman he is a pig and a jerk.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The heart sees what the eyes do not, and the heart hears what the ears cannot. Sight and sound are vibrations, and so is love.

Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett,  Friends 2 Lovers: The Unthinkable
Quote: It's better to have a few faithful friends than numerous shallow friendships.

Author: Sarah Dunn
Quote: She never got a chance to fall out of love, to do it properly, slowly and thoroughly, and the result was he was like a phantom limb. Gone but still there. And like a true phantom limb, the preponderance of feelings associated with him were painful.

Author: Sarah Dunn
Quote: She knew that what she was going through was nothing special, just garden-variety heartbreak, the sort of thing that poets and novelists had been writing about for hundreds of years, but she also knew, from those same books, that there were people who never recover form it, ones who go on through life beset by a dim and painful longing.

Author: A.M. Riley,  Immortality is the Suck
Quote: One thing I've learned is it's better to be addicted to things than people. You get hooked on a thing and if someone takes it from you, you can find another source. Only people can really hurt you. Only people can push you out into the cold permanently.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I find Bukowski to be so edgy, gritty, and daring that he oozes romance, and if couples read him in bed they would appreciate what they have.

Author: David Richo,  Daring to Trust: Opening Ourselves to Real Love and Intimacy
Quote: The foundation of adult trust is not "You will never hurt me."It is "I trust myself with whatever you do.

Author: Brandon Sanderson,  The Well of Ascension
Quote: Those who take lightly promises they make to those they love are people who find little lasting satisfaction in life. This is not an easy time in which to live. That does not mean that it has to be a difficult time to love, but it does mean that you will find unusual stresses upon your lives and your relationship.

Author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack
Quote: Relationships are never about power, and one way to avoid the will to power is to choose to limit oneself- to serve.

Author: Nora Roberts
Quote: A relationship isn't something that has to be created in a day or perfected in a day. Part of the game is to keep working on it. It's something that'll always be just a little flawed.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,  The Little Prince
Quote: You will have five hundred million little bells, and I shall have five hundred million springs of fresh water...

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The heart is man’s treasure, and that’s why it’s locked in a cage of ribs with only one key. The key isn’t metal or material—it’s the feeling of love.

Author: Michael Stein
Quote: When she was younger, she felt that he wanted to know everything about her, but she was sometimes afraid to tell too much. She was afraid he would know her too well, that he would find some weakness in her, some element that would turn him away, maybe even a quality she didn't even realize she possessed.

Author: David Levithan,  Every Day
Quote: I can see that the sadness has returned. And it's not a beautiful sadness- beautiful sadness is a myth. Sadness turns our features to clay, not porcelain.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The words “I love you” swim and swarm as they swirl and form fluidly, and if you are thirsty then how I feel about you is an extra large—with free refills.

Author: Peter Kreeft,  Jesus-Shock
Quote: The heart is like a woman, and the head is like a man, and although man is the head of woman, woman is the heart of man, and she turns man's head because she turns his heart.

Author: Kelley Armstrong,  The Gathering
Quote: It was completely fifth garde and completely silly and I loved it, because he wasn't afraid to be silly. It was like kissing him first - I could do whatever I wanted and not have to worry what he'd think of me.

Author: André Brink,  Before I Forget
Quote: To respect the dignity of a relationship also implies accepting the end when it comes. Except in my mind, except in my dreams, where the aftertaste of her still lingers.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I wrapped your birthday present in carpet, because I bought you a floor. It’s so you have something other than me to walk all over.

Author: Alessandra Torre
Quote: I'm done. I don't need anything more out of life. I have you, and that's enough.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: The best kind of humans are the ones who stay.

Author: Steve Toltz,  A Fraction of the Whole
Quote: Regrets came up and asked me if I’d like to own them. Declined them for the most part but took a few just so I wouldn’t leave this relationship empty handed.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: Be a bit of a challenge; not because you're playing games but because you realize you're worth the extra effort.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: The only real battle in life is between hanging on and letting go.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: When you look at the past without God’s eyes, you subject yourself to deception. The past no longer exists and God doesn’t linger there. However, Satan will show you whatever you want to see and believe, so you will be trapped in an emotion that cannot communicate truth, beyond what you want to remember.

Author: Cecily von Ziegesar,  You Know You Love Me
Quote: Give a girl a boyfriend and she becomes a total expert on relationships

Author: Alice Hoffman,  Local Girls
Quote: Still, she knows one thing for certain: never judge a relationship unless you are the one wrapped up in its arms.

Author: Rachel Machacek,  The Science of Single: One Woman's Grand Experiment in Modern Dating, Creating Chemistry, and Finding L ove
Quote: I've found that when you're wrapped up in the process of dating and want so badly to have something work out with someone -anyone- it's easy to forget that your choices aren't limited to one person or the other. There's also the choice I always forget about: To not choose anyone in order to keep myself open to someone who IS right for me.

Author: Amy Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night.. You were balancing ten tiny footballs on your nose while dancing with a turquoise unicorn.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: Sometimes the most beautiful people are beautifully broken.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: We swallowed the chaos because we knew we didn't want to be ordinary.

Author: Amanda Mosher,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: Dawn is meant for Lovers. And so is dusk and anytime in between. Count me in. And out. In, out, in, out, and I just came, I saw, I conked out.-Amanda Mosher and Jarod Kintz

Author: François Truffaut
Quote: In love, women are professionals, men are amateurs

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I sip my coffee like I fall in love—alone in a field of flowers, writing poetry for the mailman, who delivers love letters, but never gets any.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: But dear, don’t be afraid of love it’s only magic.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I loved how your cheeks had a natural rouge, like a delicate rose, and I was a rogue full of thorns. I was only a flower when I was with you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She had coffee-colored eyes, if java were blue-green, and we made love like nobody was watching, which is probably why the audience demanded a refund for our poor performance.

Author: John Knowles,  A Separate Peace
Quote: All of them, all except Phineas, constructed at infinite cost to themselves these Maginot Lines against this enemy they thought they saw across the frontier, this enemy who never attacked that way-if he ever attacked at all; if he was indeed the enemy.

Author: Abraham Kuyper
Quote: He is your friend who pushes you nearer to God.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When her boyfriend broke his leg, I knew it was my chance to ask her to dance. So I put down my baseball bat and approached her like Babe Ruth.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have a Rubik’s Cube for a heart, and my love for you is no puzzle. Through twists and spins, life can only get more colorful.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: This Valentine’s Day rent a poem for your loved. They come in three sizes—small, medium, and romantic. Free refills available to Premium Members.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I let coffee drip into my mouth the same way I fall in love—slowly, as I wring out my shirt before going to scrub off the 32-ounce spill. I’m as romantic as a free-refill station that’s out of sugar, cream, and stirring sticks.

Author: Lee Goff
Quote: Sometimes the door closes on a relationship, not because we failed but because something bigger than us says this no longer fits our life. So, lock the door, shed a tear, turn around and look for the new door that's opened. It's a sign that you're no longer that person you were, it's time to change into who you are. It's going to be okay.

Author: Stephen King,  The Stand
Quote: She couldn't be on his wavelength all the time. That's all. When you could recognize that and deal with it, you were on your way to an adult relationship.

Author: Nicole McKay,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night... you kept meowing at people and licking yourself it was not unlike you normally.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  EyeLeash: A Blog Novel
Quote: I was flipping channels, watching this cheerleading program on MTV. They took a field hockey girl and “transformed” her into a cheerleader by the end of the show. I was just wondering: what if she liked field hockey better?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I'm offering you love on a stick. If you'd like, you can grab it to go. It’s like a popsicle, only it won’t melt if you put it through hell like you did with you last boyfriend.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: How do new watches catch up with old watches that have had more time to get a head start? This is what I pondered while I waited on her to fall in love with me.

Author: Janet Skeslien Charles,  Moonlight in Odessa
Quote: Give a man a centimeter and he'll think he's a ruler.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She was a tall drink of water from Tallahassee, and I was an instant-coffee kind of lover. I got her so hot that neither one of could go to sleep until the ambulance finally came to a complete stop.

Author: Josephine Humphreys,  Rich in Love
Quote: You know a relationship has deteriorated past the point of salvage when one person detests another's gestures.

Author: Shannon L. Alder,  300 Questions LDS Couples Should Ask Before Marriage
Quote: When you can’t reach the standards of another’s heart you must ask yourself, "What value do I put on my soul that I would subject myself to such rejection?

Author: Toni Coleman
Quote: Be careful whom you choose to love. This decision will impact your future life and happiness in ways you cannot yet imagine.

Author: Aleksandar Hemon,  The Lazarus Project
Quote: It seemed that we loved each other better when there were large swaths of two continents between us. The daily work of love was often hard to perform at home.

Author: Amanda Mosher,  Better to be able to love than to be loveable
Quote: There is nothing more beautiful than a vulnerable heart in open hands.

Author: John Gray,  Men Are from Mars, Women Are from Venus
Quote: If we are to feel the positive feelings of love, happiness, trust, and gratitude, we periodically also have to feel anger, sadness, fear, and sorrow.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: The bank of love is never bankrupt.

Author: John Green
Quote: It's easy to like someone from a distance. But when she stopped being this amazing unattainable thing or whatever, and started being, like, just a regular girl with a weird relationship with food and frequent crankiness wh's kind of bossy--then I had to basically start liking a whole different person.

Author: Rachel Gibson,  I'm In No Mood For Love
Quote: You want the fairy tale.""I want a chance at it.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: They feel life is for the taking, and that everyone deserves happiness no matter what the cost. I must remember these tricks if I ever decide to have my soul surgically removed.

Author: Amanda Grace,  But I Love Him
Quote: Each piece of glass is another piece of myself I gave to him. It's too bad I didn't keep any pieces for myself.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: I want to go to Martha’s Vineyard. I have an aunt named Martha. And an uncle by that name. Neither one is related to me.

Author: Jaeda DeWalt
Quote: To be deeply loved, means a willingness to cut yourself wide open, exposing your vulnerabilities... hopes, hurts, fears and flaws. Hiding behind the highlight reel of who you are, is the real you and that person is just as worthy of love. There is nothing more terrifying or fulfilling, than complete love, it's worth the risk... reach for it.

Author: Arzum Uzun
Quote: In this storyI am the poetYou're the poetry.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: So many events and moments that seemed insignificant add up. I remember how for the last Valentine´s Day, N gave flowers but no card. In restaurants, he looked off into the middle distance while my hand would creep across the table to hold his. He would always let go first. I realize I can´t remember his last spontaneous gesture of affection.

Author: Louise Caiola
Quote: Trying to fall out of love is like trying to climb a mountain. Blindfolded, on crutches, naked in a hail storm.

Author: Amanda Mosher,  Better to be able to love than to be loveable
Quote: I will never claim to know what you are thinking. I only hope I am on your mind.

Author: André Gide
Quote: He who wants a rose must respect her thorn.

Author: Lorrie Moore,  Anagrams
Quote: They had, finally, the only thing anyone really wants in life: someone to hold your hand when you die.

Author: Marilynne Robinson,  Gilead
