Quote: A man can know his father, or his son, and there might still be nothing between them but loyalty and love and mutual incomprehension.

Author: Tanzy Sayadi,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: The aching in my chest isn't because I miss you,it's realizing that you have become someone I no longer know,your fears, your 4 am thoughts, your achievements,are things I no longer have an equivalent to.Who we were and who we are are four different people, and the me from now doesn't relate to the me from then, let alone to the you from now.-Tanzy Sayadi and Jarod Kintz

Author: Tiffany Madison
Quote: Women that can work a camera with ease often work men just as effortlessly for both require the same commitment to vanity and manipulation.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: The sunset produces flower clouds in a garden in the sky, and while there is still light you can see a heavenly representation of my love for you.The sunrise produces rays that light up the world like your eyes do when you're with me. They shimmer and I can see the stars in your eyes that gleam from your soul.-Jarod Kintz and Karen Quan

Author: Jarod Kintz,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: I remember being surrounded by the heaven-sent scent of July pine in the Rockies, as you and I laughed and danced like the snow would never come. Now, as the snow covers everything, just like I in these sheets, I close my eyes, preparing myself to see you again, my summer queen.-Jarod Kintz and Tanzy Sayadi

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Is it better to be feared or loved? Loved, because people associate with you because they want to, not because they need to. We need to eat beets, but we want to eat cake. Be the cake of the world.

Author: Bauvard,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. You were lost in a daydream, when I walked in and you began screaming. But I know that could never actually happen. In real life I only enter people’s nightmares.

Author: Eric Ludy,  When Dreams Come True: A Love Story Only God Could Write
Quote: .."I don't even know her yet..but if she could see me right now, I'd want her to know that I love her.."~E.L.~

Author: Mary Ann Shaffer,  The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society
Quote: Then i imagined a lifetime of having to cry to get him to be kind, and I went back to no again.

Author: Joss Whedon
Quote: Everyone has their first date and the object is to hide your flaws. And then you're in a relationship, and it's all about hiding your disappointment. And then, once you're married, it's about hiding your sins.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The scent of Florida honeysuckle uplifted in a spring breeze reminds me of your love, and how fresh it was until it blew past me into my past.

Author: Darnell Lamont Walker,  Creep
Quote: Sometimes our walls exist just to see who has the strength to knockthem down.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I were hairy, would you vacuum my chest before we made love? I’d probably have enough chip crumbs in it to feed the homeless, because I’m a charitable kind of guy.

Author: John Christopher,  The Prince in Waiting
Quote: We had been friends. We could not become strangers. It left only one thing: we must be enemies.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: So many women are fighting to receive my love that Chuck Norris had to intervene, and instantly he was defeated by desire. #OutBoastKanye

Author: Judith Lewis Herman,  Trauma and Recovery
Quote: Over time as most people fail the survivor's exacting test of trustworthiness, she tends to withdraw from relationships. The isolation of the survivor thus persists even after she is free.

Author: Loretta Ellsworth,  In a Heartbeat
Quote: I look back to where my life had been. It's always risky to think of letting go. That's why this is the perfect ending. Nothing left to reconcile.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Serpent's Shadow
Quote: dealing with any man means dealing with multiple personalities.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Between Portland and Seattle is a mint factory, and they made sweets like we made sweet love, and America needs more manufacturers like us.

Author: Andrew Sean Greer,  The Story of a Marriage
Quote: Perhaps love is a minor madness. And as with madness, it's unendurable alone. The one person who can relieve us is of course the sole person we cannot go to: the one we love. So instead we seek out allies, even among strangers and wives, fellow patients who, if they can't touch the edge of our particular sorrow, have felt something that cuts nearly as deep.

Author: Banana Yoshimoto,  Asleep
Quote: I never tell my boyfriend that I'm busy when I'm not. No matter how effective they are, cheap techniques like that just don't agree with me. So it's always okay, it's always all right. In my opinion the surest way to hook a man is to be as open with him as possible.

Author: Orson Scott Card,  Enchantment
Quote: It's as if every conversation with a woman was a test, and men always failed it, because they always lacked the key to the code and so they never quite understood what the conversation was really about.

Author: Christian Simamora,  All You Can Eat
Quote: Terkadang,yang tak bisa kamu lupakan adalah seseorang yang tak pernah bisa kamu miliki.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: It’s funny, for all it took was a broken heart and that alone was enough, enough for her to do everything she ever dreamed of.

Author: Dirk Wittenborn,  Fierce People
Quote: We are the sum of all people we have ever met; you change the tribe and the tribe changes you.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Scholars, theologians, and even poets have yet to be able to truly describe and touch upon the beauty, romance, and magic of a relationship built on 100% authenticity

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She has a body for years, and I have an astronaut tan. When we make love it will be like (x + 2)(2x -1) = 0, solve for x.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  The Truth About Forever
Quote: Here was a boy who liked flaws, who saw them not as failings but as strengths. Who knew such a person could exist, or what would have happened if we'd found each other under different circumstances? Maybe in a perfect world. But not in this one.

Author: bell hooks,  Breaking Bread: Insurgent Black Intellectual Life
Quote: I believe that it is impossible for two individuals not committed to their own and each other’s well being to sustain a healthy and enduring relationship.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Who we were and who we are are four different people, and the me from now doesn't relate to the me from then, let alone to the you from now.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Requiem
Quote: With the cure, relationships are all the same, and rules and expectations are defined. Without the cure, relationships must be reinvented every day, languages constantly decoded and deciphered. Freedom is exhausting.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I fall in love with you four times a year: winter, spring, summer, and fall. The leaves may change, but how I feel about you does not.

Author: Matty Healy
Quote: Life’s too short to drink crappy coffee and cry over boys who don’t care.

Author: Ray Bradbury,  Fahrenheit 451
Quote: I just want someone to hear what I have to say. And maybe if I talk long enough, it’ll make sense.

Author: Joseph J. Ellis,  His Excellency: George Washington
Quote: Because he could not afford to fail, he could not afford to trust.

Author: Angelina Jolie
Quote: Just start off with the same goals in mind. If you have the same values, same goals then you'll be on track for the same future.

Author: Melanie Benjamin,  Alice I Have Been
Quote: Why, then, did I always feel as if his happiness was my responsibility? It wasn't fair for him to burden me with that. It had never been fair.

Author: Gary Chapman,  The Five Love Languages Singles Edition
Quote: Love is something you do for someone else, not something you do for yourself.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
Quote: All's fair in love and war,"said Ron brightly, "and this is a bit of both.

Author: Hanif Kureishi,  Intimacy
Quote: You don't stop loving someone just because you hate them.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: When we replace a sense of service and gratitude with a sense of entitlement and expectation, we quickly see the demise of our relationships, society, and economy.

Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett,  Friends 2 Lovers: The Unthinkable
Quote: Look for the heart in a man before you look at what he has.

Author: Nora Roberts,  Savor the Moment
Quote: He gave her a quick, casual kiss on the cheek first. Then came the hug, and it was the hug that always made Laurel’s heart mush. Serious grip, cheek to the hair, eyes closed, just a little sway. Del’s hugs mattered, she thought, and made him impossible to resist.

Author: Ray Lamontagne
Quote: And when all your faith is gone let it be me, if it's a friend you need let it be me

Author: Ashly Lorenzana
Quote: When you want to share something with another person more than anything, it is one of the most difficult things to realize that you can never have it. Accepting this realization is even more difficult. Loving someone does mean saying goodbye to them in some cases, though we will fight that until the oftentimes bitter end before doing the right thing.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: The snag about marriage is, it isn´t worth the divorce.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A pitcher throws baseballs, but a pitcher also holds liquid. My emotions are so fluid I wonder how large the pitcher would have to be to hold my heart. Probably 6’3”.

Author: Pablo
Quote: Everyday it gets easier to connect with an electronic device that it is to connect with real people.

Author: Michel de Montaigne,  The Complete Essays
Quote: [Marriage] happens as with cages: the birds without despair to get in, and those within despair of getting out.

Author: Erin McCarthy,  Hard and Fast
Quote: Alright, good night,” he said, his words a little slurred. “But before I pass out, I want you to know that you’re the hottest biscuit this side of the gravy boat.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Titanic would never have sunk if it were made out of a sink.
Quote: I prefer long-distance relationships. If we were dating, would you be offended if I asked you to stand back a few feet?

Author: Michael Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night. The best day of my life was when I taught you how to juggle, but the best day of yours was when you taught someone else.

Author: Martina Boone,  Compulsion
Quote: Love doesn't come with an on-off switch. It's made of too many threads of memory and hope and heartache that weave themselves into the very core of who you are.

Author: Greg Behrendt
Quote: First of all, never buy a man a plasma TV until you're married. A lot of men once they have a plasma TV they don't need a girlfriend

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Teach me to dance and I'll show you how to make love to music. The first 30 minutes are free, but after that I'm gonna have to charge you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I made a cauldron of coffee, and I was thinking we could chug it and then teach each other how to dance by using the bottom of a floating canoe as a ballroom.

Author: Robin McKinley,  Pegasus
Quote: ...there remained a strange formality between them, and her pleasure in his presence felt too much like missing him had felt during the last week.

Author: Dorothy Parker,  The Collected Dorothy Parker
Quote: Prince or commoner, tenor or bass,Painter or plumber or never-do-well,Do me a favor and shut your face -Poets alone should kiss and tell.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love coffee cake, but I would prefer if it were just a little more drinkable. I almost choked while chugging some this morning, and if it weren’t for the fluid nature of clownfish, I might have caught feelings for Hillary using a basketball net.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Often people that settle in life are those that only do what they can with what they have and where they are. Never settle for someone that didn't know your worth from the beginning, or build a life without God in it. Live beyond your low expectations.

Author: Leopold von Sacher-Masoch,  Venus in Furs
Quote: Alas, woman is faithful as long as she loves, but you demand that she be faithful without love and give herself without enjoyment. Who is cruel then, woman or man?

Author: Bradley Trevor Greive,  Looking for Mr. Right
Quote: They (penguins) then fall madly in love and live happily ever after.-And so you ask yourself: "If a penguin can have a worthwhile, stimulating relationship, why the hell can't I?"-Or maybe you ask yourself: "Would I be happier if I started dating a penguin

Author: Kimberly Novosel,  Loved
Quote: We kissed each other until we were too tired to keep going. I could still feel him holding back. It was my penance for what I had done to him. All I could do was hope the walls would fall and that I could have all of him again, but I was always leaving and he was tired of watching me walk away. We both knew that I couldn’t stay and that he couldn’t come with me, but still, we couldn’t let go.

Author: Charlaine Harris,  Dead Until Dark
Quote: Life had sure been simpler when I hadn't dated.

Author: Martina Boone,  Compulsion
Quote: We've lost a lot of years, but you can't lose love. Not real love. It stays locked inside you, ready for whenever you are strong enough to find it again.

Author: John Lewis Lund,  How to Hug a Porcupine: Dealing With Toxic & Difficult to Love Personalities
Quote: Even if toxic people are right about what is "good,"they are wrong if the approach is not healthy.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: Someday I will have revenge. I know in advance to keep this to myself, and everyone will be happier. I do understand that I am expected to forgive N and his girlfriend in a timely fashion, and move on to a life of vegetarian cooking and difficult yoga positions and self-realization, and make this so much easier and more pleasant for all concerned.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I hide how I feel, and I hide the fact that I hide how I feel, but I can't bury the past without having a funeral of the heart.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The wind may be invisible, but it’s colored by memories of you, as you gently blew into my life, adding motion and emotion to my still-beating heart.

Author: Nalini Singh,  Caressed by Ice
Quote: You're walking funny,"Lucy said, a shit-eating grin on her face. Five days of out of this world sex with a starving man could do that to a girl."You're just jealous."Brenna pushed through the door into DarkRiver's business HQ.Lucy made a mournful face. "Yes, I am. Goddamn but your man is hot. And he smiles at you! I've seen him do it, even if no one believes me.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Two people with mental issues in a relationship does not work. It's like sitting in a boat and neither one has an oar to row the other to shore. You can meet your mirror image in life, but that doesn't mean you should marry him.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A white wedding dress, once worn, is like the ghost of a moment, trapping feelings of forever into fabric that’s never to be tried on again.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Every night I sleep like a log. In a lit fireplace. If you bring the marshmallows, I’ll bring the burning desire for you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her beauty took my breath away, and allowed the spring breeze to fill my lungs with honeysuckle, jasmine, and desire.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love kiss whispers—kisspers. Loose lips are full of passionate secrets.

Author: Thornton Wilder,  Our Town
Quote: People are meant to go through life two by two. ’Tain’t natural to be lonesome.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I die with a zillion dollars and you die with zero, our net worth is worthless. All that matters is the love we level across our lives.

Author: Myles Munroe,  Waiting and Dating
Quote: It is the same way with dating. The time you are most prepared for dating is when you don't need anyone to complete you, fulfill you, or instill in you a sense of worth or purpose.

Author: Catherynne M. Valente,  The Girl Who Fell Beneath Fairyland and Led the Revels There
Quote: Hearts set about finding other hearts the moment they are born, and between them, they weave nets so frightfully strong and tight that you end up bound forever in hopeless knots, even to the shadow of a beast you knew and loved long ago.

Author: Michael Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night. We watched pornography together, but purely for the storyline.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: I had to learn to live without you and I couldn't make sense of it, because I left so much of me inside of you.

Author: Kristi Maxwell
Quote: Living together/ is one move closer/ to living apart

Author: P.G. Wodehouse,  Jeeves in the Morning
Quote: When a girl uses six derogatory adjectives in her attempt to paint the portrait of the loved one, it means something. One may indicate a merely temporary tiff. Six is big stuff.

Author: Sarah Dunn,  Secrets to Happiness
Quote: Ordinarily, I am the person who falls in love quickly and somewhat inappropriately and then goes on to destroy what is a good thing. That's always been my style. So, you know: I get it. And I feel right now the way I imagine all those guys felt with me. And I have to say, for the first time in my life, I feel something approaching compassion for them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Xazaqazax
Quote: A scaly lizard in soapy water makes a great scrubber. I’d wash my hands of her, if I didn’t enjoy being treated like a dishrag so much.

Author: Beyoncé Knowles
Quote: I used to want you so bad, I'm so through with that because honestly you turned out to be the best thing I never had!

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: I love you as the mother of my child": the kiss of death.Mother of His Child: demotion. I am beginning to see this truism: Mothers are not always wives. I have been stripped of a piece of self.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: Surprises, I feel now, are primarily a form of violence.

Author: Kathy Lette,  To Love, Honour And Betray
Quote: When you've been around as long as me, Lucy, you'll know that there are three types of sex... One - brand-new, kitchen-table sex. Two - bedroom sex. Then number three - hallway sex, when you pass each other in the hallway and say 'Fuck you.'"- Lockie

Author: Amy Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night.. You were playing with chicken livers and told me everyone was in quarantine.

Author: Eloisa James,  When Beauty Tamed the Beast
Quote: I love you,"he said, his voice catching. "When I thought you were going to die, I wanted to die.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: The wind may be invisible, but it’s colored by memories of you, as you gently blew into my life, adding motion and emotion to my still-beating heart. I feel you here with me, even though I'm all alone. Time is only measured now by then seconds since you've gone, and losing you is as painful as running a faucet on a bloody wound.-Jarod Kintz and Crystal Woods

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My kitchen sink has no truck attached. My love needs a waterproof suitcase in these Days of Desert and Dessert. Who are you going to come running to when the Ice Cream Man melts?

Author: Cesare Pavese,  The Burning Brand: Diaries, 1935-1950
Quote: From someone who doesn't want to share your destiny, you should neither accept a cigarette

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: I’m older now than my dad was when he was my age. Wait, that’s not right. That’s not my dad at all, that’s just some stranger hanging around in my memory.

Author: Diana Peterfreund,  Tap & Gown
Quote: Sometimes you met someone that changed the pattern, who wormed their way past the cracks in your heart, caulked them up, sealed themselves in, and stayed there. Sometimes they did it by insisting you meet them at every step, as Jamie had done to me.

Author: Stephan Labossiere
Quote: Some people don’t realize what they have until it’s gone, but that does not always mean they are supposed to get it back.

Author: Marina Keegan,  The Opposite of Loneliness: Essays and Stories
Quote: But it became clear very quickly that I'd underestimated how much I liked him. Not him, perhaps, but the fact that I had someone on the other end of an invisible line. Someone to update and get updates from, to inform of a comic discovery, to imagine while dancing in a lonely basement, and to return to, finally, when the music stopped.

Author: Nicole McKay,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night.. you were trying to give coordinates to an apple

Author: Hope Bradford,  Beneficial Law of Attraction: The Manifestation Teachings
Quote: Everyone creates realities based on their own personal beliefs. These beliefs are so powerful that they can create [expansive or entrapping] realities over and over.~Kuan Yin

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Xazaqazax
Quote: The naked truth is the naked truth isn’t naked—it’s wearing see-thru clothing. My duty as a nudist is to let people see I’m transparent.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: If I lived a million lives, I would've felt a million feelings and I still would've fallen a million times for you.

Author: Albert Einstein,  Ideas and Opinions
Quote: But without deeper reflection one knows from daily life that one exists for other people--first of all for those upon whose smiles and well-being our own happiness is wholly dependent, and then for the many, unknown to us, to whose destinies we are bound by the ties of sympathy.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The lungs are fishing nets for smoke, and I inhaled her essence like she was marijuana grown just for me.

Author: Aleksandar Hemon,  The Lazarus Project
Quote: I loved you because there was no other place for me to go. We were married because we did not know what else to do with each other. You never knew me, nothing about me, what died inside me, what lived invisibly.

Author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer
Quote: Every advantage is temporary.

Author: Jack R. Rose
Quote: Hating hurts the hater the most. Hating is not a salve for the wounded soul, it is an abrasive that keeps the soul wounded and raw and oversensitive.

Author: Gary Chapman,  The Five Love Languages Singles Edition
Quote: Love doesn't erase the past, but it makes the future different.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: When a man plays with your heart it is for one of two reasons: He knows he can or he is undecided.

Author: Laurie Halse Anderson,  Wintergirls
Quote: No, I am never setting foot in this house again it scares me and makes me sad and I wish you could be a mom whose eyes worked but I don't think you can.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I saw someone who so closely resembled you that my heart started beating like a hummingbird's wings, and my mind flew back to where we were when we were we’re.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I watered your memory every day to keep it alive, and after all this time it's like a tall cypress tree rooted deep in the St. John's River.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  EyeLeash: A Blog Novel
Quote: [novan]: bassists are very good with their fingers[novan]: and some of us sing backup vocals, so that means we're good with our mouths too...(~ IM chat with Novan Chang, 18, bassist)

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I were splat proof, I wouldn’t be afraid of heights. Also, I wish I had a bouncy ball for a heart, so I could love fearlessly.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I loved her, she loved him, and he loved himself. Now she loves me, he loves her, and I love myself as I am—without her in my life.

Author: Meenakshi Gigi Durham,  The Lolita Effect: The Media Sexualization of Young Girls and What We Can Do About It
Quote: In the realm of love and sex, it’s girls who are in the position of working hard to adapt themselves to the needs and fantasies of the mercurial males whose approval and attention they seek.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I like my coffee like Colfax Avenue mixed with Atlantic Boulevard, and if you're buying then I'm driving. Let's sip this romance slowly.

Author: Vironika Tugaleva,  The Love Mindset
Quote: A soul mate is not found. A soul mate is recognized.

Author: G.G. Vandagriff,  The Last Waltz
Quote: It's always seemed to me that flirtation is a man's device for avoiding responsibility. He can say whatever he wants and knows he won't be taken seriously.

Author: Kim Addonizio
Quote: Love me like a wrong turn on a bad roadlate at night.

Author: Crystal Woods,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: I fell for you like the stars fall from the sky. Flames and light and twinkle dust, our burning love showered the night. The dust has been collecting since the day you left, and I dare not leave even one fingerprint in it, because one should never try to touch the past.-Crystal Woods and Jarod Kintz

Author: Jarod Kintz,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: You may not be here with me now, but you've never left me, because I keep you close to my heart, and always on my mind. And I will sit under your shade forever, until I become a part of you, the way you are a part of me.-Jarod Kintz and Crystal Woods

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I use two yards of wrapping paper per one inch of present. Luckily I gave you the gift of love, so I was able to wrap it in tinfoil. Uncover before reheating.

Author: Marian Keyes,  The Other Side of the Story
Quote: Relationship gurus always said that an attraction based on friendship and mutual respect was far more likely to stay the course - and the bastards were right.

Author: Raquel Cepeda,  Bird of Paradise: How I Became Latina
Quote: I have never bought into the idea that blood is thicker than water. Love and respect are meant to be earned from our children, our spouses, our families, and our friends.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: He announces that lately he keeps losing things. "Like your wife and child,"I want to say, but don´t. At fourty, I´ve learned not to say everything clever, not to score every point.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  Tender Is the Night
Quote: Most people think everybody feels about them much more violently than they actually do; they think other people's opinions of them swing through great arcs of approval or disapproval.

Author: Charise Mericle Harper,  Flashcards of My Life
Quote: You might think that a boy is just your friend, but then if you find out that maybe he likes you (in a boyfriend way), everything changes instantly. (47)

Author: Carrie Jones,  Entice
Quote: You will be a great queen when you come back, you know. And someday you'll love me the way you love your wolf.

Author: Lindsey Kelk,  I Heart New York
Quote: A break up is the closest thing to bereavement

Author: J.S.B. Morse,  Now and at the Hour of Our Death
Quote: A pure heart is superlatively rare and even more attractive.

Author: George Eliot,  Middlemarch
Quote: When a man has seen the woman whom he would have chosen if he had intended to marry speedily, his remaining a bachelor will usually depend on her resolution rather than on his.

Author: George Gissing
Quote: It is the mind which creates the world around us, and even though we stand side by side in the same meadow, my eyes will never see what is beheld by yours, my heart will never stir to the emotions with which yours is touched.

Author: Coco J. Ginger
Quote: You’re a mess, I confess, I despise you in the best kind of way.

Author: Amit Ray,  Nonviolence: The Transforming Power
Quote: Family, friends and relationships are the blessings of the God. They are the best way to access God.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: This is new to us, you know? Your mother's sorry. She's sorry that she hurt your feelings, and she wants you to invite your girlfriend over for dinner.""So that she can make her feel bad and weird?""Well she is kind of weird, isn't she?"Park didn't have the energy to be angry. He sighed and let his head fall back on the chair. His dad kept talking. "Isn't that why you like her?

Author: Mocco Wollert
Quote: Love falls in love with love; comes like an echo sounding back, searches its mirrored shadow within a look.

Author: Sarah Mlynowski,  Gimme a Call
Quote: Just because a relationship ends, it doesn't mean it's not worth having.

Author: Steven Barnes
Quote: Someone asked me about the difference between love and lust. Hmmm. That will take a little thought. How to tell the difference? Well, for guys, if she looks better AFTER you've made love to her than before, that might be love. If you find yourself itching to get out the door afterward, probably just lust, y'know?

Author: Jan Beatty
Quote: my only complaints are two:that I didn't make myself readyfor you sooner in life, thatI can't give you better,Love you more.

Author: Michael Crichton,  Disclosure
Quote: Friendships are nice. So is competence.

Author: Graham Greene,  The Heart of the Matter
Quote: There was a tacit understanding between them that 'liquor helped'; growing more miserable with every glass one hoped for the moment of relief.

Author: Jack Lemmon
Quote: Death ends a life, not a relationship.

Author: Hayley Williams
Quote: That was the day that I promised I'd never sing of love that does not exist. but darling, You are the only exception

Author: Vironika Tugaleva
Quote: To love everyone unconditionally does not mean to give everyone your unconditional time. Sometimes, to love completely, we must never see someone again. This, too, is love. This is giving someone the freedom to exist and be happy, even if it must be without you.

Author: John Green,  An Abundance of Katherines
Quote: Uh-uh, dude. I tried it your way with the dating and the girls and the kissing and the drama, and man, I didn't like it. Plus, my best friend is a walking cautionary tale of what happens to you when romantic relationships don't involve marriage. Like you always say, kafir, everything ends in breakup, divorce, or death. I want to narrow my misery options to divorce or death - that's all.

Author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer
Quote: Everybody deserves love, but nobody is entitled to it.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  Gatsby Girls
Quote: You've got an awfully kissable mouth.

Author: Alexandra Elle
Quote: We can't be so desperate for love that we forget where we can always find it; within.

Author: Emily Giffin,  Baby Proof
Quote: I still think I love him more. It's one of those things you never know for certain because there's no way to enter all the relationship data in a computer and have it spit out a definitive answer. You can't quantify love, and if you try, you wind up focusing on misleading factors.

Author: Keri Hulme,  The Bone People
Quote: A family can be the bane of one's existence. A family can also be most of the meaning of one's existence. I don't know whether my family is bane or meaning, but they have surely gone away and left a large hole in my heart.

Author: J.P. Rattie
Quote: Miscommunication is endless.

Author: Ellen J. Barrier
Quote: On the left side of a strong woman, stands a strong man; he is strengthened by her character.

Author: Rita Rudner
Quote: A good place to meet a man is at the dry cleaner. These men usually have jobs and bathe.

Author: Nora Ephron,  I Feel Bad about My Neck: And Other Thoughts on Being a Woman
Quote: It's always hard to remember love - years pass and you say to yourself, Was I really in love, or was I just kidding myself? Was I really in love, or was I just pretending he was the man of my dreams? Was I really in love, or was I just desperate?

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: Maybe I hope too much. Maybe I dream too much or maybe I love too much to just give up on you.

Author: Belle Aurora,  Love Thy Neighbour
Quote: Tina leans forward and asks quietly, 'Do you? You know? Love her?'Squeezing Nat’s knee again, I reply, 'She’s teachin’ me how.

Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett,  Friends 2 Lovers: The Unthinkable
Quote: You never know who's waiting for you and you never know when love is coming your way or who it might be. But let me just say, a healthy relationship requires SACRIFICE and DEDICATION.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: She was broken from moment to moment, watching her world collide she felt lost inside herself. She fell apart for a passion that flamed beneath her. She waited and died a hundred times, it dripped from her pores. The moment she let go, she soared over the stillness like the star she was born to be.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: It was never about the world being too big, it was more like she was too much for the world to handle.

Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett,  Friends 2 Lovers: The Unthinkable
Quote: Faith doesn't get you around problems in life and relationships, it gets you through it.

Author: Kimberly Pauley,  Still Sucks to Be Me: More All-True Confessions of Mina Hamilton Smith, Teen Vampire
Quote: The best defense is a confusing offense.

Author: Nora Roberts,  Savor the Moment
Quote: And since I’m marrying into the Quartet, I have certain privileges and duties. If you’re sleeping with Laurel—”“I’m not sleeping with Laurel. We’re dating.”“Right, and the two of you are just going to hold hands, admire the moon, and sing camp songs.”“For a while. Minus the singing.

Author: Robin Black,  If I Loved You, I Would Tell You This
Quote: It's unexpectedly painful to have become a pronoun.

Author: Myles Munroe,  Waiting and Dating
Quote: A woman may be beautiful but have poor character. A man may be a business genius, making money left and right, but lack common courtesy, sensitivity, and compassion.

Author: Brian L. Weiss,  Messages from the Masters: Tapping Into the Power of Love
Quote: Often we take personally the slings and arrows of our 'abusers'. But frequently we are merely the interchangeable pawns of their own neurotic dramas. Anyone else in your position would have received the same treatment. There is nothing especially noxious or negatively noteworthy about you.

Author: M.A. Stacie,  Unwritten Rules
Quote: I always watch you. You consume my every thought.

Author: Roman Payne
Quote: When I touched her body,I believed she was God.In the curves of her formI found the birth of Man,the creation of the world,and the origin of all life.

Author: Myles Munroe,  Waiting and Dating
Quote: A wedding is and event, but marriage is a life.

Author: John Green,  Paper Towns
Quote: You know your problem, Quentin? You keep expecting people not to be themselves.

Author: Dave Barry
Quote: The best baby-sitters, of course, are the baby’s grandparents. You feel completely comfortable entrusting your baby to them for long periods, which is why most grandparents flee to Florida.

Author: Julia Cameron,  God is No Laughing Matter
Quote: We need to bridge our sense of loneliness and disconnection with a sense of community and continuity even if we must manufacture it from our time on the Web and our use of calling cards to connect long distance. We must “log on” somewhere, and if it is only in cyberspace, that is still far better than nowhere at all. (264)

Author: Louise Rennison,  Knocked Out by My Nunga-Nungas
Quote: I wonder if it is possible to have two boyfriends. I mean, times are changing. Relationships are more complicated. In France men always have mistresses and wives and so on. Henri probably has two girlfriends. He would laugh if you told him you just had one. He would say, 'C'est tres, tres tragique.'

Author: Renata D. Johnson
Quote: Ain't No Drama Like Bedroom Drama

Author: Budd Schulberg
Quote: Isn't everyone a part of everyone else?

Author: Emily Giffin,  Love the One You're With
Quote: Despite the fact that I have no regrets about how things turned out in my life, I still can't help wanting to understand my intense relationship with Leo, as well as that turbulent time between adolescence and adulthood when everything feels raw and invigorating and scary-and why those feelings are all coming back to me now.

Author: Gustave Flaubert,  Madame Bovary
Quote: Before her marriage she had thought that she had love within her grasp; but since the happiness which she had expected this love to bring her hadn’t come, she supposed she must have been mistaken. And Emma tried to imagine just what was meant, in life, by the words “bliss,” “passion,” and “rapture” - words that had seemed so beautiful to her in books.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: She wildly burned for the one she loved and he stood there watching, hoping he too would catch a blaze from the violence stirring in her heart.

Author: Therese Benedict
Quote: When you walk a life of honesty, you live a life of truth.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: Take me now, God!"I shout to the inky sky. "I´m ready.""You´re not ready. You´re not even divorced yet,"Bunny says. "You cannot die married to that man.

Author: Kathryn Stockett,  The Help
Quote: He needs "space"and "time,"as if this were physics and not a human relationship.

Author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Unbecoming of Mara Dyer
Quote: Why?' He asked.'Why what?' What could I say? Noah, despite you being an asshole, or maybe because of it, I'd like to rip off your clothes and have your babies. Don't tell.

Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote: It was a bitter moment for us. We weren't two mature parents. We were just two kids playing grown-up. We still needed Mommy and Daddy's permission, blessings, and money to survive.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: A Plan B life can be just as good or better than a Plan A life. You just have to let go of that first dream and realize that God has already written the first chapter of the new life that awaits you. All you have to do is start reading!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  We Had A #Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. Dinner for two turned into dinner for three when you told me you were pregnant. I was excited, but a little nervous, because we were at a fancy restaurant and I only had enough money in my wallet to pay for two. So being the gentleman I am, I suggested that we skip out on the bill after we were finished eating.

Author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack
Quote: Women, in general, will find it difficult to turn from a man and stop demanding that he meets their needs, provides security, and protects their identity, and return to me. Men, in general, find it very hard to turn from the works of their hands, their own quests for power and security and significance, and turn to me.

Author: Mabel Iam
Quote: Love is beyond reason. Love is not measurable in words. Love cannot be partial; it cannot have owners. Love is essentially beyond definition or concept.

Author: Damon Suede,  Hot Head
Quote: For the first time in his life he understood why the Bible called sex "knowing". Everything was different. Now he knew Dante. He'd known Dante. And wonder of wonders, Dante had known him right back.

Author: Ai Yazawa,  Nana, Vol. 1
Quote: I wanted to have a good relationship. One that's romantic and dramatic, like in the movies. But I finally became a woman at 17 and learned that men aren't really that simple.

Author: Ashly Lorenzana
Quote: If somebody never gets enough of you, they will always want more

Author: Michael Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I didn't dream about you last night. I woke up in fear.

Author: Meredith Wild,  Hardwired
Quote: You lose yourself, Erica, because with the right person, who you become together is something so much greater, more than you could even realize right now.

Author: Sherwood Smith,  Court Duel
Quote: No, I don't think I could fall in love with him, handsome though he is, because I don't accept any of that huff he gives me about my great beauty and all that. I'd have to trust a man's words before I could love him. I think.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: She needed the chaos within her in order to discover the extraordinary no man could ever reach.

Author: Margaret Atwood,  The Blind Assassin
Quote: Better not to invent her in her absence. Better to wait until she's actually here. Then he can make her up as she goes along.

Author: Michael Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night. We stopped telling each other about our dreams when we realized we were still inside them.

Author: S.J. Watson,  Before I Go to Sleep
Quote: I wish I hadn't. I wish I'd fought for you. I was weak and stupid.

Author: Tammy-Louise Wilkins,  My Intimate Poetry
Quote: What's the difference?"You ask meThe difference is, a smile touches my lipsWhen I remember both the memory of you entering my lifeAnd the memory of you leaving my life

Author: Miguel Syjuco,  Ilustrado
Quote: Love and honesty don’t mix.

Author: Ice-T,  Ice: A Memoir of Gangster Life and Redemption-from South Central to Hollywood
Quote: That's one of the first things that comes out of young people's mouths when they're in love. FOREVER. And that's cool, it's all good-until you get old enough to realize what forever is.

Author: Stephen King,  The Gunslinger
Quote: Shall there be truth between us, as two men? Not as friends, but as enemies and equals?

Author: Nenia Campbell,  Armed and Dangerous
Quote: He was everything your mother warned you about when she told you not to walk alone in the dark.

Author: Steve Kluger
Quote: Just because you discover that you may like somebody after all, it doesn't necessarily mean there's any attraction.

Author: Emily Brontë,  Wuthering Heights
Quote: Hereafter she is only my sister in name; not because I disown her, but because she has disowned me.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: How do you know? How best to ensure his nervous breakdown?"I ask."Keep going,"Christian says. "Just go on as if nothing has happened. We all hate that.

Author: L.A. Witt,  Rules of Engagement
Quote: If I knew how a lot of my relationships would have turned out, I never would have gotten involved in them... And I would have missed out on some of the best times in my life.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  The Casual Vacancy
Quote: Sometimes, if she simply remained quiet, and let the inadequacy of his excuses reverberate on the air, he became ashamed and backtracked.

Author: Marian Keyes,  Watermelon
Quote: Failed relationships can be described as so much wasted makeup.Forget the laughs, forget the fights, forget the sex, forget the jealousy. But take off your hat and observe a moment's silence for the legions of unknown tubes of foundation, mascara, eyeliner, blusher and lipstick who died that it might all have been possible. But who died in vain.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.
Quote: I want to write a song about retaliation called, "Oh Yeah, and I Faked Every Orgasm...While You Were Out of Town.

Author: Grace Burrowes,  The Heir
Quote: I love you, he thought, because you are honest with me and because you are willing to speak the truth to me when others might seek to curry favor instead. I love you because you are in this bed with me, not trying to conceive the much-awaited next generation of Windhams, but just holding my hand.-- Gayle Windham

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Hide yourself in God, so when a man wants to find you he will have to go there first.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: Its dark and I’m reading my scars because our moments remind me of where I should be.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  If you bring the booze and food, I'll bring the thirst and hunger
Quote: Chairs have legs. Four of them, like my father. Meow.

Author: Jeaniene Frost,  Halfway to the Grave
Quote: Bones,” I sighed. “Know something? I’m not afraid of you, but you scareme….” His outline blurred again.“You scare me, too, Kitten,” he might have replied, but I couldn’t be sure.

Author: May Sarton,  Journal of a Solitude
Quote: One has only to set a loved human being against the fact that we are all in peril all the time to get back a sense of proportion. What does anything matter compared to the reality of love and its span, so brief at best, maintained against such odds?

Author: Karen Salmansohn,  Even God is Single:
Quote: God is even in a single parent household.

Author: Michael Bassey Johnson
Quote: I don't talk with everybody because i am not everybody, i am single.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: Ask anyone and they'll most likely say their family is crazy, and if they don't say their family is crazy, their friends are crazy. That's because everyone is crazy after taking the mask off. People are most themselves when not really trying to fit in, when either alone or around those already closest to them, and that is crazy.

Author: Nicole McKay,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night... you were there.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: You’re not a bad person, you’re just a little bit different and I’m a sucker for that.

Author: Emily Giffin,  Baby Proof
Quote: I spend the rest of the afternoon trying to explain to Zoe one of the very saddest notions in love and life: sometimes the timing is wrong--and sometimes you realize the heart of the matter way to late in the game.

Author: Kelli Jae Baeli,  ISO
Quote: You're only responsible for being honest, not for someone else's reaction to your honesty.

Author: Amy Guth,  Three Fallen Women
Quote: Mismatches destroy us all, even the most tender ones, and most never have the courage to break someone else's heart to follow their own.

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: In relationships, there are no beginning and no end.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Shakespeare's Sonnets
Quote: If thou dost seek to have what thou dost hide,By self-example mayst thou be denied.

Author: Anonymous
Quote: Long distance relationships do not rely on physical love, long distance relationships are driven by the love that inspires your heart, mind and soul.

Author: Jerry L. Lewis,  What God Can't Do
Quote: Faithfulness in small things leads to faithfulness in great things, and never the other way around.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Xazaqazax
Quote: They should make cell phones that are dishwasher safe. My cup runneth over—especially since both our drinks are in one glass because I’m too lazy to load the shotgun.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: Maybe love was meant to save us from ourselves.

Author: Eric Jerome Dickey,  Pleasure
Quote: Women were excited after sex, wired becasue in their minds the relationship was on beginning. Men went to sleep m the because for the orgasm had arrived and the relationship was done.

Author: John Christopher,  The Pool of Fire
Quote: Some people are oil and water.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One as if all that matters is to have someone love and accept you. The other is as though loving and accepting another person is all that matters. Often, when you choose the second you get the first.

Author: Sara Naveed,  Undying Affinity
Quote: There is nothing right or wrong in love. Where there is love, then there is nothing but only love.

Author: Laura Pedersen,  Best Bet
Quote: Relationships are so much like the United States - they only really thrive when faced with an external threat.

Author: Brian L. Weiss,  Messages from the Masters: Tapping Into the Power of Love
Quote: Understand the nature and influence of repeating patterns, from childhood experiences or even from past lives. Wthout understanding, patterns tend to repeat, unnecessarily damaging the relationship.

Author: Robyn Donald,  Tiger, Tiger
Quote: People don't get to our ages without having pasts. I'm more interested in the future.

Author: Jerry Spinelli,  Today I Will: A Year of Quotes, Notes, and Promises to Myself
Quote: Disagreement is not necessarily a reason to head for Splitsville. In fact, a relationship without disagreement is probably too brittle to last. Some of the best human bonds are forged in the fire of disagreement.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: I know how you feel because I’ve been there too. I’ve hated and I’ve loved. I’ve seen my demons root and crawl and my angels branch and soar. I've died within myself and lived a thousand different lives. I too fight the same war and I too am drowning in the puddles of self-consciousness this world created.

Author: Rachel Hansen
Quote: Just because he likes the same bizzaro crap as you doesn't mean he's your soul mate.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: The manlier you are, the harder it is to understand what a woman wants: there is not a hint of female brain in you.

Author: Daniel Handler,  Why We Broke Up
Quote: Everything else has vanished, so you take them now. Maybe if you're the one keeping them, I'll be the one feeling better.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  At even one penny, this book would be overpriced. In fact, free is too expensive, because you'd still waste time by reading it.
Quote: Two one-armed people might seem perfect for each other, but what if they’re both missing the same arm? Then even something simple like holding hands while walking becomes a case of they’re too similar to see themselves really going anywhere as a couple.

Author: Hanif Kureishi,  Intimacy: das Buch zum Film von Patrice Chéreau
Quote: If you never left anything or anyone there would be no room for the new. Naturally, to move on is an infidelity -- to others, to the past, to old notions of oneself. Perhaps every day should contain at least one essential infidelity or necessary betrayal. It would be an optimistic, hopeful act, guaranteeing belief in the future -- a declaration that things can be not only different but better.

Author: Orson Scott Card,  Children of the Mind
Quote: Miro, I'm so sorry. I always felt such pity for you humans because you could only think of one thing at a time and your memories were so imperfect and . . . now I realize that just getting through the day without killing somebody can be an achievement."It gets to be a habit. Most of us manage to keep our body count quite low. It's the neighborly way to live.

Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,  Brushstrokes of a Gadfly
Quote: Love is supposed to be based on trust, and trust on love, it's something rare and beautiful when people can confide in each other without fearing what the other person will think.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: God is great and God is good,"Lisa says. "But where are the Apache attack helicopters when you need them?

Author: Meg Cabot,  Queen of Babble Gets Hitched
Quote: And you can't have two stars in one relationship. Somebody has to be willing to be the wagon...at lease some of the time

Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Other Side of Life
Quote: Anya looked upon Nin admirably. Having him as a partner-in-crime—if only on this one occasion, which she hoped would only be the start of something more—was more revitalizing than the cheap thrills of a cookie-cutter shallow, superficial romance, where the top priority was how beautiful a person was on the outside.

Author: Nelson Algren,  A Walk on the Wild Side
Quote: Never play cards with a man called Doc. Never eat at a place called Mom's. Never sleep with a woman whose troubles are worse than your own.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  99 Cents For Some Nonsense
Quote: I heard a song I hate and I thought of her. Ah, such is love.

Author: Vironika Tugaleva
Quote: If you do not respect your own wishes, no one else will. You will simply attract people who disrespect you as much as you do.

Author: Arzum Uzun
Quote: Don't feed your ego with my soul.

Author: Louise Glück,  Ararat
Quote: As I saw it, all my mother's life, my father held her down, like lead strapped to her ankles.She wasbuoyant by nature;she wanted to travel,go to the theater, go to museums.What he wantedwas to lie on the couchwith the Timesover his face,so that death, when it came,wouldn't seem a significant change.

Author: Nick Hornby,  About a Boy
Quote: You wouldn't believe that so much could change just because a relationship ended.

Author: Lisa Logue,  Cursed Secrets
Quote: For someone who is supposed to be a knight in shining armor, you're acting like an ass in aluminum foil.

Author: Stephen King,  The Gunslinger
Quote: He was one of those quite rare adults who communicate with small children fairly well and who love them all impartially--not in a sugary way but in a businesslike fashion that may sometimes entail a hug, in the same way that closing a big business deal may call for a handshake.

Author: Kellie Elmore
Quote: Sacrifices made for love are fine, unless the sacrifice is you.

Author: Arthur Conan Doyle,  The Case-Book of Sherlock Holmes
Quote: There is a soul-jealousy that can be as frantic as any body-jealousy.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: I need you because I know I deserve you but let me fall in love with you one last time before I let go. So I can remember the beautiful imperfection that rattled my bones.

Author: Catherynne M. Valente,  Deathless
Quote: Just remember that the only question in a house is who is to rule. The rest is only dancing around that, trying not to look it in the eye.

Author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie
Quote: There is no formula to relationships. They have to be negotiated in loving ways, with room for both parties, what they want and what they need, what they can do and what their life is like.

Author: Nora Roberts
Quote: Parker: She believed, absolutely, that each person, each heart, had a counterpart—had a mate. A rightness. She’d always believed it, and understood that unshakable belief was a reason she was good at what she did.

Author: Emily Giffin,  Baby Proof
Quote: I decided that giving a girl a ring when you're not in a serious relationship is sort of like giving a guy a blow job when you have no real feelings for him. It makes everything feel a little cheap.It cheapens the giver and the recipient.

Author: Paul Orfalea,  Copy This!: Lessons from a Hyperactive Dyslexic who Turned a Bright Idea Into One of America's Best Companies
Quote: Happy wife, happy life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: I had to hand it to him, leaving the empty glove lying on the bed was an apt metaphor for love. Two things I can say about my grandpa are that he is wise, and his left hand is probably cold.

Author: Myles Munroe,  Waiting and Dating
Quote: When certain parts of our bodies are touched, certain enzymes and chemicals that trigger sexual desire are released into our system. The more our bodies are stimulated, the more chemicals are released and the greater our sexual desire grows until it becomes a virtually unstoppable flood.

Author: Matt Dunn,  Best Man
Quote: A relationship needs constant attention. It’s a living thing, not just a habit. You’ve got to keep on top of it.

Author: Adriana Trigiani,  Viola in Reel Life
Quote: This is where men and women are different, we can put aside petty competition for relationships - they can't. It interferes.

Author: Mabel Iam
Quote: Among the many answers I have found, I believe love is the most beautiful and simple art that reflects the beauty of life.

Author: Wendy Cope,  Serious Concerns
Quote: The day he moved out was terrible – That evening she went through hell.His absence wasn’t a problemBut the corkscrew had gone as well.

Author: Tamora Pierce,  Shatterglass
Quote: If I have to 'catch' a man to get a husband, I don't want one.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: How could I live above the water or breathe under it. How could I swim in darkness consumed in an ocean of you? Falling or flying towards you, losing or finding myself in you and beauty was never the word to catch all that you are. For now I know the means of the infinite and it all starts and ends with you.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: At the end of the day I went to this place where your memories left footsteps on my skin and the breath of your touch stained my desire. Yea, it was one of those nights where I needed you the most.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  At even one penny, this book would be overpriced. In fact, free is too expensive, because you'd still waste time by reading it.
Quote: She asked me if I was seeing anybody else, and I said, No, the other woman is invisible.

Author: Amy Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night... You turned red, then green, and then blue. You told me you were trying to fit in with the m&m's.

Author: Mark Gungor
Quote: Wearing a condom is like eating an icecream cone with a sock on your tongue.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: With all honesty, somewhere between the hello and the dreams I saw you in I fell in love.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: She wasn't broken. She was just bent, over the chance of being ignored by the one she loved.

Author: Grace Helbig
Quote: Young love is so ridiculous, as is middle-aged and old love. And it’s also hilarious. When have you ever felt so vulnerable and wonderful and terrible at the same time?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Seriously delirious, but not at all serious
Quote: The girl I used to love is no longer a girl, and this saddens me more than our separation. It puts my own mortality vividly on display, in contrast to my eternally youthful memories.

Author: H. Norman Wright
Quote: In marriage, each partner is to be an encourager rather than a critic; a forgiver rather than a collector of hurts; an enabler rather than a reformer.

Author: Nicole McKay,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night.. You thought you were a candy vampire, you were standing in the sun screaming 'I'm melting.

Author: Nicole McKay,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night... I was a brick and you were a blanket. Damn that improbability drive.

Author: Suzanne Finnamore,  Split: A Memoir of Divorce
Quote: How can I grieve what is still in motion?"I ask her. "Shoes are still dropping all over the place. I´m not kidding,"I say. "It´s Normandy out there.

Author: Travis Luedke,  The Shepherd
Quote: Our lives were now worlds apart, separated by time, circumstance, and the unbridgeable chasm of money.

Author: Rachel Cohn,  Naomi and Ely's No Kiss List
Quote: Dumped doesn't even begin to describe it. If you're going to use a trash metaphor, incinerated is more like it.

Author: Michael Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night. We went to the store cupboard to make out, but we ended up sharing our pain and then crying together. We wasn't prepared for this level of intimacy.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: Maybe what this is. What we have, is something that will save us from ourselves.

Author: Emily Dickinson,  I'm Nobody! Who Are You?
Quote: Mine Enemy is growing old --I have at last Revenge --The Palate of the Hate departs --If any would avenge Let him be quick -- the Viand flits --It is a faded Meat --Anger as soon as fed is dead --'Tis starving makes it fat

Author: Christina Westover,  Poisoning Sylvie
Quote: She realized, when relationships failed to last, it was not because love was no longer present, but because people had stopped believing in themselves and in their partners.

Author: Henry Cloud,  Safe People: How to Find Relationships That Are Good for You and Avoid Those That Aren't
Quote: You aren't alive if you aren't in need.

Author: Michael Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night. We were plug sockets in the bedroom. We saw only a short part of their day, but we knew everything of it.

Author: Amy Guth,  Three Fallen Women
Quote: There was a time Jeff and Helen loved each other and touched each other's hands and ate breakfast in cafes together and secretly fucked in public, the way people in like do. Then came a time they made each other crazy and beat their hands on steering wheels and tore up love letters and photographs and said goodbye.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: Love tames the benumbed beast. A man is put to use regarding a woman's physical safety, but a woman is put to use regarding a man's mental safety.

Author: Kirsten Smith,  The Geography of Girlhood
Quote: I realize the thing about a guy you've spent your whole life loving from afar is that even though he's real you've really made most of him up.

Author: Jack Weyland,  As Always, Dave
Quote: I could now see her the way she actually is and not in the distorted way my mind presented her to me when I was trying to find a reason to reject her and move on

Author: Fiona Thrust,  Naked and Sexual
Quote: I live for sex. I celebrate it, and relish the electricity of it, with every fibre of my being. I can see no better reason for being alive.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: Suddenly I remembered that laugh, it told a different story, our story.

Author: Amy Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night... Unfortunately, it wasn't a dream.

Author: Edmond Rostand,  Cyrano de Bergerac
Quote: Proclaim your pride and bitterness loudly to the world, but to me speak softly, and tell me simply that she doesn't love you.

Author: Amy Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night... You tried to propose with a digital ceramic heater.

Author: Amy Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night.. You were in the amazon rain forest yipping like a dog.

Author: Laini Taylor,  Daughter of Smoke & Bone
Quote: I was going to say the beginning is the good part, when it's all sparks and sparkles, before they are inevitably unmasked as assholes.

Author: Nick Hornby,  Juliet, Naked
Quote: Everyone disliked their partners at some time or another, she knew that. But she’d spent her hours in the dark wondering whether she’d ever liked him. Would it really have been so much worse to spend those years alone? Why did there have to be someone else in the room while she was eating, watching TV, sleeping?

Author: Amy Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night.. You kept screaming at Ted Danson to pour you a drink.

Author: Bauvard,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. We couldn't decide on a sunrise. You wanted a tan, I only cared about the view. Then World War III fulfilled both our desires.

Author: Bauvard,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. You suggested to split the profits, so I did. I threw one half in the furnace to power the steam engine, and the other half in the air to distract our pursuers.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Who Moved My Choose?: An Amazing Way to Deal With Change by Deciding to Let Indecision Into Your Life
Quote: I think you know if you disappeared from my life I’d be upset, but ultimately I’d make myself a new invisible cloak, to replace the one you stole.

Author: Nicole McKay,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night... Well I say dream I mean nightmare... you were a Yankee fan.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  The Casual Vacancy
Quote: She seemed to think that one of the perks of marriage was that it gave you rights of comment and intrusion over single people's love lives.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  We Had A #Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. We were trying to come up with a hashtag to market our relationship. I suggested #fourlipsonekiss and #twomouthsonevoice, but you went with something confusing like #idontloveyou and #wearenotinarelationship.

Author: E.M. Forster,  Where Angels Fear to Tread
Quote: He had known so much about her once -what she thought, how she felt, the reasons for her actions. And now he only knew that he loved her, and all the other knowledge seemed passing from him just as he needed it most.

Author: Bauvard,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. You were being hung. I had a sword in one hand and a stool in the other. I couldn’t decide which one to use, so I stood on the stool and threw myself on the sword. It was the least I could do to protest capital punishment.

Author: Rebecca Wells
Quote: ...you do not have too many boogeymen for me. You have just the right number.

Author: Carl White
Quote: You can only trust your emotions as you can lie to yourself with your brain but not your heart.

Author: Emma Daley
Quote: I've decided that there isn't much difference in the way we treat our siblings and the way we treat our special someones. But at the end of it all we know our siblings have to forgive us...or they'll never be able to borrow our car.

Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett
Quote: When all one person do is complain, people don't want to talk or listen to them.

Author: Anthony Liccione
Quote: To save face, it's better not to ask sex from the ex, but to give everything the axe.
